Yova Kindeni imo kinda nenda Maro Ŋalae. Ina uru ikai poe panzi tamâta rârâni simo tâno kulu.
I ne mbutukunâŋa muŋgâŋa ŋinde ma ikeno mine ikura zo zo. I ma iveta ikura ne ŋgua pâŋa mine ku imo nâ.
Nanayoni ipambwâre kuku Abraham, aku ŋgua pâŋa ŋinde ikeno pa Abraham natu Isaka tona.
Yova Kindeni ipa ŋgua kuku Isaka natu Yakopu, aku ŋgua pâŋa ŋinde ma ikeno mine nâ ikura zo rârâni. Iveta ŋgua pâŋa kunzi Isrel ŋgu, aku ŋinde ma marumbu tia.
Yova Kindeni ne ŋgua pâŋa kala ŋine: “Naŋa ma Kenan tâno alua miki. Naŋa apatea tâno ŋinde tu ma ikeno pa miki tavanzi nemi vâsa ŋgu.”
Mao nâ, nia ndoyo Yova Kindeni ne ŋgu ŋinde kambwaŋenzi nde kiri-mwata, aku simo tâno ŋinde sitogo lombo mine.
Lâ zo ŋinde kinzi simo sondo tia. Kinzi uru soka silâ pa tâno pinde, aku muli ŋga silâ pa tâno pinde. Kinzi simo koipu ŋalae toŋge ne tâno ikura zo mbwana-mbwana nâ, ŋineŋga sipile tâno ŋinde ku silâ pa koipu ŋalae toŋge ne tâno.
Andeta Yova Kindeni ŋandai isâu panzi tinikoa ŋgu tu ma sizavarunzi ŋga. I itu kaika panzi koipu ŋalaŋala tu ma siveta soki pa i ne ŋgu ndimo.
Ipainzi tu, “Naŋa apateanzi tamâta ŋine tu ma sikai wurâta pa naŋa. Miki ma kaveta kemi sakamao toŋge panzi ndimo. Miki ma kakai kazâŋa panzi naneŋgu ŋgua-tulâŋa tamâta ndimo.”
Yova Kindeni iveta putole ŋalae ipâŋga Kenan tâno, tâno ŋine i ne ŋgu simo, aku izavaru kanzi kâpwa rârâni marumbu lâ.
Andeta i ilo tu ma ivilanzi ne tamâta. Mine kala muŋgani lâ isupwa Yosepe ilâ pa Isip tâno imuŋga panzi. Vetâŋa ŋinde nde ipâŋga mine; tamâta pinde siko Yosepe saŋenzi tua, aku sikai silâ Isip tâno ku iveta wurâta koa tia nâ panzi.
Kinzi wâlo kaika nâ sipa i kie, kala kie nâna. Aku simwali wâlo kaika ku silita lâ i ŋandola tona.
I imo mine lee, ŋineŋga vetâŋa pinde ipâŋga, aku vetâŋa ŋinde nde kie taituni itogo Yosepe muŋga iporo tu ma ipâŋga mine. Mine kala ŋgua ŋinde Yova Kindeni itula pa Yosepe nde ipâŋga kanaŋo.
Ŋineŋga Isip nenzi koipu ŋalae ipalele ilo kalo ku isupwa tamâta toŋge ilâ iyaule wâlo kaika piti lâ Yosepe tini. Mao nâ, koipu ŋalae ŋinde ikai Yosepe piti lâ luma sakamao ilo ku iyâti imâ.
Aku koipu ŋalae ŋinde io Yosepe ipâŋga tamâta ŋalae. Mine kala Yosepe imo koipu mbâna-mbâna lâ Isip tâno.
I ne wurâta nde ŋana ikai poe panzi koipu ŋalae ne dumui wa ipanananzi tamâta ŋinde uru situla ilo-kalo pa koipu ŋalae wa.
Aku muli, ŋineŋga Yosepe tama Yakopu kala ilâ imo Isip tâno tona.
Kinzi simo Isip tâno lee, ku Yova Kindeni ivilanzi tamwata ne ŋgu, kala sipulianzi nenzi vâsa rârâ sipâŋga. Iveta nenzi walo ipâŋga ŋalae, ipole nenzi kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde nenzi walo.
Mine nde ilele kinzi Isip tamâta ilonzi kalonzi kala sikai kazâŋa panzi i tamwata ne ŋgu. Ŋineŋga kinzi Isip siroto nzâla ŋana siveta soki panzi Yova Kindeni ne wurâta tamâta.
Ŋineŋga Yova Kindeni ipateanzi ne wurâta tamâta rua, Mose ku Aron rua, aku isupwanzi ŋana sivilanzi i ne ŋgu.
Mine kala kinzi rua situla Yova Kindeni ne mâsi ŋalaŋala kie-kie ipâŋga Isip tâno.
Mao nâ, lâ zo ŋinde Yova Kindeni iveta kondoma ŋalae ipâŋga itura Isip tâno ndoni, andeta kinzi taŋanzi kaika nâ pa i kawa ŋgua.
Aku iveta lââ ipalele ipâŋga see tona, kala Isip kanzi iŋa rârâni sipamateteu marumbu lâ.
Aku ivetanzi piri-piri sipâŋga kambwaŋenzi walo tona, kala sipipi lâ sikura tâno ŋinde ndoni. Kinzi silâ lee sipipi lâ koipu ŋalae tamwata ne luma ilo tona.
Aku Yova Kindeni iporo ŋgua, ŋineŋga lâŋo wa nipa-nipa rârâ ŋinde nde simâ sipâŋga tava, ku silâ sikura tâno ŋinde ndoni.
Aku i ŋandai io karâzi nâ indue pa nenzi tâno ŋga. I io karâzi “ais” tava loloa indue imâ ŋana iyaula nenzi tâno.
I iyaula nenzi kâi waini wa kâi “fik” wa, aku imbware nenzi kâi pinde rârâni nuki-nuki tona.
Aku i kawa iporo ŋgua, ŋineŋga ndemu-ndemu rârâ ŋinde simâ sipâŋga tona. Tamâta toŋge ikura tu isowe kambwaŋenzi, ande tia ndo.
Kinzi ndemu-ndemu sika kelekele rârâni launzi keno, aku sika kâpwa ndoni Isip tamâta muŋga sipau kala ipâŋga tâno ilo ŋinde tona.
Ŋineŋga Yova Kindeni ipunzi Isip ŋgu natunzi tamâne nzâla-kulu rârâni sipamateteu.
Aku muli, ŋineŋga Yova Kindeni ikainzi Isrel ŋgu sipile Isip ku siyâti silâ. I iveta mine; igagati kinzi Isip ilonzi kalonzi, kala sikai nenzi siŋgâra arara “silva” wa “gol” rârâni ku silanzi Isrel ŋgu, kala sikai silâ. Kinzi Isrel tamâta rârâni soka ara nâ silâ, aku Yova Kindeni ne tamâta toŋge ipayaula ande tia.
Ŋana tu kinzi Isip ŋgu siruru pâta ŋananzi Isrel ŋgu. Mine kala lâ zo ŋana kinzi simora tu Isrel ma sipilenzi silâ, ande ilonzi ndeka nâ.
Kinzi Isrel ŋgu nde soka silâ, aku Yova Kindeni io take-take toŋge imâ ituranzi ne tamâta. Aŋga lâ mbo, ande isupwa yââ ŋalae ipâŋga isinalanzi itogo sinâla mine.
Kinzi sino papa ŋana simbi pinde, aku ionzi sii pinde simâ, kala i ne ŋgu sika. I samba ne kâpwa ilanzi sika, kala kapwanzi pupuro ndo.
Aku kinzi sirakoŋa ŋana lââ tava. Mine nde iveta mira ŋalae toŋge tu ipwa, kala lââ imaliŋi irere indue ilâ pa nia bilimu, itogo lââ irere dugu ilo mine.
Mao nâ, i kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana ŋgua pâŋa sapâŋa ŋinde muŋga iveta kuku ne wurâta tamâta Abraham.
Mine kala ikainzi i tamwata ne pateâŋa tamâta siyâti silâ. Kinzi sisuŋa kawanzi ŋalae, aku siwâŋgi ku sindeka nâ silâ.
Aku muli ŋga ikai tinikoa ŋgu nenzi tâno ku ikisi keri panzi i ne ŋgu ŋinde kala simo ndaina, aku isâu panzi tu ma sika kâpwa kinzi ŋgu ŋinde muŋga sipau ipâŋga tâno ilo.
Iveta mine ŋana duvi ŋine kâ: i ilo tu kinzi Isrel ŋgu ma sipono muli pa i ne ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni wa i kawa ŋgua ndoni wa. Tapanea Yova Kindeni ŋa tasuka kâki!
Tapanea Yova Kindeni ŋa tasuka kâki! Kawânda ndaŋge pa i, ŋana tu i nde ara tamwata, aku i uru tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Tamâta toŋge ikura ŋana itula mâsi ŋalaŋala rârâni Yova Kindeni muŋga iveta ŋinde duvi pwataki, ande tia. Aku tamâta toŋge ne paneâŋa ma irerege kuku i ne vetâŋa ŋinde, ande tia.
Kinda tasama tu Yova Kindeni ne nzâmbe ara ikeno panzi tamâta ea soka i ne tukuŋa muli ku sipaveta kuku vetâŋa ara ikura zo rârâni.
Mine nde Yova Kindeni, lâ zo ŋana noko ma kuvilanzi ne tamâta, ande naŋa ano pano tu kalo ŋgere ŋana naŋa kâ tava. Mao nâ, lâ zo ŋana noko ma pwainzi piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, ande naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma pwai naŋa piti tona mine nâ.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu amora noko ne tamâta simo ara wa sikai kelekele arara wa, aku naŋa atu andeka kunzi noko tamwata ne ŋgu. Noko kupatea maka pa tamwata, aku naŋa atu andekanano kunzi.
Yova Kindeni, maka kaveta kiesaka, itogo timbuma muŋga siveta mine. Maka kaveta vetâŋa potomule wa mâsi sakamao kie-kie.
Nanayoni, lâ zo ŋinde maka timbuma simo Isip tâno, ande kinzi ŋandai kalonzi ŋgere sondo ŋana mâsi ŋalaŋala ŋinde noko kuveta panzi ŋga. Noko kutula pwataki panzi mbwani rârâ tu noko tini mwasa ndo panzi. Andeta kinzi kalonzi kapa ŋana ŋinde kâ, aku lâ zo ŋinde kinzi silâ sipâŋga Tâi Ŋiŋi pwali, ande kinzi taŋanzi kaika papa Yova Kindeni Walo Tamwata.
Andeta Yova Kindeni ilo patea tu ma itula ne walo kaika ŋalae ŋinde pwataki panzi. Mine kala ikea ŋananzi, itogo muŋga ipa ŋgua tu ma iveta mine, kala ŋandai sipayaula ŋga.
I iveta mine; i itu ŋgua kaika papa Tâi Ŋiŋi, kala tâi mâsa-mâsa lâ. Mine nde ikainzi ne tamâta soka mâsa-mâsa nâ lâ tâi ilo simbwaliu silâ, itogo tamâta iyoka tâno kaika mine.
Mao nâ, iyautenzi piti lâ tamâta pinde mbaunzi ilo, kinzi ŋinde uru wisinzi nâna panzi. Ivilanzi kala nenzi kazâŋa tamâta sikura tu sizavarunzi, ande tia.
Andeta tâi ipatukunzi nenzi kazâŋa tamâta marumbu lâ, kala kinzi rârâni naonzi tia lâ.
Ŋineŋga Yova Kindeni ne tamâta kalonzi tawana i ne ŋgua pâŋa, aku siwâŋgi wâŋgiŋa paneâŋa kâ papa i.
Andeta kinzi walele nâ kalonzi kapa ŋana Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa ŋinde kâ. Aku kinzi ŋandai sio tininzi pa Maro Kindeni tu ma itula ne pateâŋa pwataki panzi ŋga. Kinzi sikai siveta ikura warakanzi nâ nenzi ilo-kalo.
Kinzi simo nia bilimu, aku ilonzi ŋalae koŋa ŋana sika kâpwa ara pinde kâ. Mine kala siveta soki ku siporo ŋgua kaika pa Maro Kindeni.
Ŋineŋga Maro Kindeni isâu panzi, aku kelekele ŋinde kinzi sita ŋana, ande ŋinde ilanzi lâ. Andeta iveta pukoŋa ŋalae ipâŋga panzi tona.
Kinzi sipa nenzi pâla kâki simo nia bilimu, andeta tamâta pinde ilonzi ŋuru-ŋuru ŋana Mose kâ. Aku mine nâ, kinzi sipadâda ŋana Yova Kindeni tamwata ne wurâta tamâta Aron tona.
Mine nde tâno ipwa kawa maa, aku Datan tavanzi Abiram ne ŋgu ndoni nde patanzi sindue silâ mbââ ilo. Ŋineŋga tâno kawa kapu ku itataunzi lâ.
Ŋineŋga yââ iyoka pa samba indue imâ kananzi tamâta sakamao ŋinde muŋga sipono muli panzi Datan ku Abiram rua, kala sipamateteu lâ.
Ŋineŋga silâ sipâŋga Orep Tuu, ande sikai mira “gol” ku siveta bulmakao tai toŋge, aku sipare tukunzi papa maro laŋeŋa ŋinde.
Kinzi sipile nenzi mâsi ŋana sipare tukunzi pa Yova Kindeni, inani ŋa ŋalae ndo, aku sipare tukunzi pa bulmakao tamâne kaa uru ika leu nâ ŋinde tai.
Kinzi kalonzi kapa ŋana nenzi Yautâŋa Tamwata Maro Kindeni, inani kala muŋga iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala lâ Isip tâno.
Mao nâ, ina iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala kie-kie lâ Isip. Kinzi tamâta simora mâsi ŋalaŋala ŋinde iveta lâ Tâi Ŋiŋi, kala wisinzi motutu lâ. Andeta kinzi walele nâ kalonzi kapa ŋana.
Mine kala Maro Kindeni ilo patea tu ma izavarunzi ne ŋgu. Andeta i ne pateâŋa tamâta Mose nde imandi nao ku ino papa tu ma ipile ne wisi-nâna ku ma kalo sukâŋa ŋananzi. Aku Yova Kindeni isâu papa, kala izavarunzi tia.
Andeta muli ŋga, ande kinzi Isrel ŋgu tininzi pwâka tu sikai tâno ara ŋinde, ŋana tu kinzi ŋandai kalonzi tawana Yova Kindeni ne ŋgua pâŋa ŋga.
Kinzi sisaŋona nâ simo nenzi pâla ilo, aku siporo ŋgua ilonzi ŋuru-ŋuru. Kinzi ŋandai sipono muli pa Yova Kindeni kawa ŋgua ŋga.
Mine nde Yova Kindeni itu ŋgua kaika panzi, aku iporo tu ma ipunzi pâta simâte lâ nia bilimu.
Aku ipa ŋgua tu ma isoki nenzi vâsa sikâwa pwapwataki silâ simo tinikoa ŋgu ŋgininzi lee, ma sipamateteu lâ tinikoa nenzi tâno.
Ŋineŋga kinzi silâ sipâŋga Peor Tuu, aku sipono muli pa kinzi tinikoa nenzi maro laŋeŋa, i ŋa tu Bal. Kinzi sika simbi muŋga sipatarâwa papa maro laŋeŋa ŋinde, andeta maro laŋeŋa ŋinde ŋandai imo via ŋga.
Nenzi vetâŋa ŋinde igagati Yova Kindeni ilo kalo, kala i wisi nâna ŋalae ŋinde panzi. Mine kala isupwa pukoŋa sakamao ilâ ipâŋga panzi.
Andeta Finias imandi ku ipare nia panzi tamâta siveta vetâŋa soki ŋinde, kala pukoŋa ŋalae ŋinde marumbu lâ.
Kala ŋine kinda uru kalonda ŋgere ŋana Finias ne vetâŋa sondo ŋinde kâ. Aku muli ŋga, ikura zo rârâni, ande kinzi tamâta ma kalonzi ŋgere mine nâ ŋana i ne vetâŋa ŋinde kâ.
Aku zo toŋge kinzi Isrel ŋgu simo Meriba lââ bwalika, andeta siveta Yova Kindeni wisi nâna panzi. Aku ŋana nenzi vetâŋa soki ŋinde kâ, ande malia ipâŋga pa Mose.
Kinzi siveta Mose wisi nâna ndo. Mine kala i ŋandai kalo ŋgere sondo ŋineŋga iporo ŋga; ikai iporo nâ.
Muŋga Yova Kindeni iporo itu kaika panzi tu ma sipunzi tinikoa ŋgu rârâni pâta sipamateteu. Andeta kinzi ŋandai siveta ikura Yova Kindeni kawa ŋgua ŋga.
Tia ku Isrel tamâta sipakâe kunzi tinikoa ŋgu tamâta, aku sipono muli pa nenzi vetâŋa sakamao tona.
Kinzi sipare tukunzi panzi maro laŋeŋa, aku ŋinde iveta Yova Kindeni wisi nâna, kala izavarunzi lâ.
Opopo, kinzi sipunzi warakanzi natunzi simâte, itogo patarawâŋa siveta panzi maro laŋeŋa mine.
Mao nâ, kinzi sipunzi warakanzi natunzi taine wa tamâne wa simâte. Natunzi ŋinde ŋandai siveta vetâŋa soki toŋge ŋga, taitu kinzi sipunzi pâta ku sio karaenzi ilâ pa Kenan tâno nenzi maro laŋeŋa, itogo patarawâŋa mwasina. Aku nenzi vetâŋa sakamao ŋinde iveta tâno ipâŋga muso lâ Yova Kindeni nao.
Nenzi vetâŋa ŋinde iveta kinzi warakanzi sipâŋga ilonzi muso ndo lâ Yova Kindeni nao. Kinzi sipu mulinzi pa nenzi Maro Kindeni, aku silâ sipasipa kunzi maro pinde. Mine kala kinzi sipâŋga sitogonzi nzâla taine mine.
Mine nde Yova Kindeni wisi nâna ndo panzi ne tamâta. I tini pwâka ndo ŋananzi ne ŋgu.
Ipu muli panzi lâ, ku ionzi silâ tinikoa ŋgu mbaunzi ilo. Mine kala kinzi simo nenzi kazâŋa tamâta kalonzi.
Nenzi kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde nde siveta kenzi sakamao ndo panzi. Kinzi kazâŋa tamâta nenzi walo nde kaika, kala sitawanzi Yova Kindeni ne tamâta ndue ndo.
Muŋga Yova Kindeni ivilanzi ne tamâta mbwani rârâ, taitu kinzi warakanzi ilonzi patea tu ma sipu mulinzi papa i. Aku nenzi kiesaka ŋinde itawanzi ndue ndo lâ.
Taitu muli ŋga kinzi sisarâwa pa Yova Kindeni tu ivilanzi, aku ipaloŋo pa nenzi noŋa. I kalo sukâŋa ŋananzi, ŋana tu kinzi simo sakamao.
I kalo sukâŋa ndo ŋananzi, aku kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana ne ŋgua pâŋa muŋgâŋa kâ. I ilo ndo keno panzi, kala ipalele ilo kalo ku ilele nao panzi kilo.
Kinzi kazâŋa tamâta muŋga siveta kenzi sakamao nâ panzi Isrel. Andeta Yova Kindeni ŋineŋga ilulunzi ilonzi kalonzi kala kalonzi sukâŋa ŋananzi Isrel ŋgu.
Mine nde maka nema Maro Yova Kindeni, kala ŋine maka kano pano tu kuvilama lâ vetâŋa kie taituni, aku pwaima piti lâ kinzi tinikoa ŋgu mbaunzi ilo. Pwaima kataulo kalâ pa nema tâno kilo. Ambo noko ma kuveta mine, ande maka ma kawama ndaŋge ŋalae pano, ku ma kandekanano kapanea noko ŋa sapâŋa ŋinde kasuka kâki.
Tapanea Yova Kindeni, ina kinda Isrel nenda Yova Kindeni! Tapanea i ŋa tasuka kâki ikura zo zo! Miki tamâta rârâni kawami tu, “Mao nâ”. Tapanea Yova Kindeni ŋa tasuka kâki!
“Kinda kawânda ndaŋge pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i nde ara tamwata, aku i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.”
Miki tamâta ŋine Yova Kindeni muŋga ikaimi piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, miki rârâni kagogo kawami aku kaporo ŋgua ndaina.
Ŋana tu miki muŋga kamo tinikoa ŋgu nenzi tâno ikeno pa mbwera kâ wa wâra kâ wa nia ndoni wa, andeta iyautemi piti lâ ku ikaimi taulo mâ.
Kinzi pinde muŋga simo nia bilimu ku soka silâ wa simâ wa, siroto nzâla ŋana ma silâ pa lawea toŋge tu ma simo ara kâ. Andeta sisânda nzâla toŋge kulu tia.
Kinzi putole ipunzi pâta lâ, aku sirakoŋa ŋana lââ kâ, kala ilonzi malia ndo.
Malia ikainzi mine lee, ŋineŋga sisarâwa pa Yova Kindeni tu ivilanzi, aku ikai malia ŋinde piti panzi.
Ionzi lâ nzâla ara ku ikai poe panzi. Ikainzi soka silâ lee sipâŋga lawea ara toŋge, aku simo ŋinde.
Mine nde ara ŋana kinzi ŋinde ma kawanzi ndaŋge ŋalae pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i ne tini-mwasa ikeno panzi ikura zo rârâni, aku i uru iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala arara panzi tamâta.
I uru lââ ilanzi tamâta ea sirakoŋa ŋana lââ kâ. Kinzi sinu, aku ilonzi ara ndo. Aŋga tamâta ea kinzi putole ipunzi, ande i uru kâpwa ŋalae ilanzi kala sika lee kapwanzi pupuro ndo lâ.
Aŋga kinzi pinde nde simo luma sakamao ilo. Kinzi simo nia ŋaŋa ndo. Kinzi nenzi kazâŋa tamâta muŋga sipa wâlo kaika lâ tininzi, aku nâna silanzi.
Ŋana tu kinzi taŋanzi kaika pa Maro Kindeni kawa ŋgua. Kinzi sipu Yova Kindeni Walo Tamwata ne ŋgua tukuŋa ututu.
Yova Kindeni iveta malia panzi kala simakâsa sikai wurâta ŋalae ndo, aku ilonzi kura tia ndo. Kinzi patanzi sindue tâno kulu, andeta tamâta toŋge imo ŋana isukanzi kâ, ande tia.
Malia ikainzi mine lee, ŋineŋga sisarâwa pa Yova Kindeni tu ivilanzi, aku ikai malia ŋinde piti panzi.
Yova Kindeni iyautenzi piti lâ nia kondoma ŋinde ilo, aku ipu wâlo kaika muŋga ikeno tininzi ŋinde ututu.
Mine nde ara ŋana kinzi ŋinde ma kawanzi ndaŋge ŋalae pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i ne tini-mwasa ikeno panzi ikura zo rârâni, aku i uru iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala arara panzi tamâta.
Ŋana tu imbware kinzi kazâŋa tamâta nenzi lawea ŋgumbi nzâla “aini” ŋinde ututu, aku imbware “aini” ipono luma sakamao ne nzâla kawa ŋinde ututu tona.
Aŋga kinzi pinde nde sipile ilo-kalo ara, kala sikai malia ŋana kiesaka kie-kie kinzi siveta ŋinde. Kinzi sipaveta kuku vetâŋa sakamao, kala sisânda nâna kulu.
Mine kala kinzi tininzi pwâka ŋana sika kâpwa kâ, ande kala laiti ŋana simâte kâ.
Malia ikainzi mine lee, ŋineŋga sisarâwa pa Yova Kindeni tu ivilanzi, aku ikai malia ŋinde piti panzi.
I tamwata iporo ŋgua, aku ŋgua ŋinde iveta tininzi ara kilo. Iyautenzi piti lâ nâna ilo.
Mine nde ara ŋana kinzi ŋinde ma kawanzi ndaŋge ŋalae pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i ne tini-mwasa ikeno panzi ikura zo rârâni, aku i uru iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala arara panzi tamâta.
Aku ara ŋana kinzi ma siveta patarawâŋa, ŋana itula pwataki tu nenzi ndaŋge ŋalae ikeno papa i. Aku ara ŋana kinzi ma sindeka ku siwâŋgi wâŋgiŋa situla i ne vetâŋa rârâni pwataki panzi tamâta tona.
Aŋga kinzi pinde nde sikai wurâta lâ wâŋga ŋalaŋala kulu, kala sikâwa tâi geza-geza silâ sikura lawea lawea sikai wurâta ŋana mbaliŋa kâ.
Kinzi tamâta ŋinde simora Yova Kindeni ne mâsi kilala. Kinzi simora mâsi ŋalaŋala iveta lâ tâi geza-geza tini.
Mao nâ, kinzi simora Yova Kindeni itu pa lawea, ŋineŋga lawea ŋalae imandi ku iveta kâla ikâki ŋalae.
Tâi nde isukanzi wâŋga ŋalaŋala kâki wa itawanzi ndue wa. Mine nde kinzi tamâta simo wâŋga kulu ŋinde nde siruru tu ma sipayaula, aku kalonzi loko nâ.
Kinzi sikâwa sitaŋgeŋge silâ wa simâ wa, sitogo tamâta inu lââ kaika kala idauda mine. Kinzi sisama pâta ŋana sikai poe pa wâŋga kâ, andeta sikura tu siveta vetâŋa toŋge ŋana sivila wâŋga kâ, ande tia.
Malia ikainzi mine lee, ŋineŋga sisarâwa pa Yova Kindeni tu ivilanzi, aku ikai malia ŋinde piti panzi.
Ipono lawea ŋalae kala tâi pâti kii lâ, aku kâla imâte lâ.
Kinzi simora tu tâi pâti kii lâ, kala sindeka ndo. Aku Yova Kindeni ikainzi silâ sipâŋga lawea ne mâta ŋinde kinzi ilonzi tu ma sipâti simo ŋinde.
Mine nde ara ŋana kinzi ŋinde ma kawanzi ndaŋge ŋalae pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i ne tini-mwasa ikeno panzi ikura zo rârâni, aku i uru iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala arara panzi tamâta.
Lâ zo ŋana Yova Kindeni ne tamâta ma sipasau tu siwâŋgi, ande ara ŋana kinzi tamâta ŋinde ma siporo situla i kilala pwataki tu i ŋa nde ŋalae ndo. Aku ara ŋana kinzi ma simandi tamâta mbâna-mbâna naonzi lâ nenzi pasauŋa tona, ku sipanea i ŋa sisuka kâki.
Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni ivetanzi lââ ŋalaŋala sipâŋga mâsa-mâsa ndo lâ, aku itu kaika papa lââ tu ma isâko ipâŋga tâno kulu tia kâ.
Kinzi tamâta simo tâno ŋinde nde uru siveta vetâŋa sakamao nâ. Mine nde Yova Kindeni ikai nenzi tâno ara ŋinde ne siŋi piti, ku iveta ipâŋga tâno ara tia.
Andeta Yova Kindeni itu ivilanzi ne tamâta. Mine kala iveta lââ bwalika ipâŋga nia bilimu, aku iveta lââ isâko ipâŋga nia mâsa-mâsa ku irere indue tava.
Isâu panzi tamâta ŋinde putole ipunzi tu ma sikai tâno ŋinde, kala siveta nenzi lawea ku simo.
Kinzi sipau kâpwa tava kâi waini lâ tânoni ndaina, aku kanaŋo ipâŋga maria.
Yova Kindeni iveta kie ara ndo panzi ne tamâta. Mine kala sipulianzi nenzi vâsa kambwaŋenzi rârâ sipâŋga, aku iveta nenzi bulmakao sipâŋga kambwaŋenzi walo tona.
Andeta muli, ŋineŋga kinzi kazâŋa tamâta sipolenzi Yova Kindeni ne tamâta lâ paraŋa ilo ku siveta maŋeti panzi. Kinzi siveta kenzi sakamao panzi wa nâna silanzi wa.
Andeta Yova Kindeni itawanzi nenzi kazâŋa tamâta ndue ndo, ku iŋaranzi silâ wa simâ wa lâ nia bilimu pinde nzâla keno tia.
Andeta ivilanzi kinzi sugorai tamwatanzi, kinzi ŋinde muŋga simo sakamao, aku iveta nenzi vâsa sipâŋga kambwaŋenzi walo.
Kinzi tamâta arara nde simora Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa mine ku wisinzi ara nâ. Aŋga kinzi tamâta sakamao nde siporo tia, kawanzi buu nâ.
Ayo, miki tamâta ea kamo tava nemi ilo-kalo ara, ande ara ŋana miki ma kalomi ŋgere sondo ŋana kelekele rârâni ŋinde kâ. Miki kalomi ŋgere sondo ŋana Yova Kindeni ne tini-mwasa ŋinde uru ikeno pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.

Maro Kindeni, naneŋgu kalo-tawana nde ikeno kaika pa noko nâ. Mao nâ, naŋa kaloŋgu tawanano sondo ndo, aku naŋa ma awâŋgi apanea noko ŋa asuka kâki.
Lâ mbone-mbone nâ, naŋa ma apagagati warakâŋgu amandi sânda lâ kenoŋa nia, aku ma ara neŋgu wâŋgu. Naŋa ma awâŋgi wâŋgiŋa mine lee mbwale pwataki.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa ma amandi kinzi tinikoa ŋgu naonzi, ku ma kawâŋgu ndaŋge pa noko. Naŋa ma awâŋgi wâŋgiŋa paneâŋa kâ pano lâ tamâta ŋgu rârâni ŋgininzi.
Ŋana tu noko ne tini-mwasa nde kiri-mwata tia ndo. Ŋinde ikeno mine ku imo nâ, aku ne keri nde ilâ ikura lâ nia maa ikeno âta ŋinde. Ikura zo zo noko kuveta ikura ne ŋgua pâŋa rârâni, aku mâsi ŋinde nde ŋalae ndo, ipole take-take ikeno samba tini ŋinde.
Maro Kindeni, naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kuveta mâsi toŋge ipâŋga samba tini, ŋana itula noko kilala pwataki tu noko tamwata nde Maro Ŋalae. Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kuveta ne walo kaika ipâŋga nia yo panzi tamâta ndoni simo tâno kulu.
Noko ilo ndo keno pa maka, aku ne walo nde ŋalae tina. Mine nde maka kano pano tu kupaloŋo pa nema noŋa, aku pwaima piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, ŋana ma kamo ara kâ.
Maro Kindeni imo i tamwata ne luma sapâŋa ilo, aku iporo tu, “Naŋa ma apole paraŋa, ŋineŋga ma andeka ŋana akisi keri lâ Sekem lawea tava Sekot ŋgu nenzi nia kawa ŋinde panzi naneŋgu tamâta.
Kinzi Ruben ŋgu aŋga kinzi Gat ŋgu nde naŋa warakâŋgu neŋgu tamâta, aku kinzi Manase ŋgu kala simo naneŋgu tamâta mine nâ. Kinzi Efraim ŋgu nde sitogo naneŋgu sambara kaika ŋana paraŋa kâ, aŋga kinzi Juda ŋgu nde sitogo koipu ŋalae ne tukâla uru ikeno naŋa mbauŋgu ilo.
Taitu naneŋgu morâŋa ikeno mine ŋananzi naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta; kinzi Moap ŋgu nde ŋgu kaa nâ, itogo kondo naŋa uru apua mbauŋgu lâ ilo mwasina. Aku kinzi Idom ŋgu kala simo ŋgu kaa nâ, kala naŋa uru keŋgu nâ apalenzi. Naŋa apolenzi kinzi Filistia ŋgu lâ paraŋa ilo, kala andeka nâ akai lolove.”
Maro Kindeni, tiambo noko tini pwâka tu pwai naŋa alâ apara kunzi ŋgu ŋinde simo lawea ŋalae ilo, laweani ndaina ne ŋgumbi kaika iŋge mbwaliu lâ, tiya? Tiambo noko tini pwâka tu pwai naŋa alâ apara lâ Idom nenzi tâno, tiya?
Tiambo noko tamwata kupu muli pa maka marumbu lâ, tiya? Tiambo noko tini pwâka tu kuvilanzi nema zugu tamâta sipole paraŋa, tiya?
Maka kasama tu kinzi tamâta nenzi pavilâŋa nde kelekele kaa nâ. Mine kala maka kano pa noko tu kuvilama ŋana kapolenzi nema kazâŋa tamâta kâ.
Mao nâ, ambo Maro Kindeni ma ivila maka, ande maka ma kapole paraŋa. I tamwata ma izavarunzi nema kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde.
Maro Kindeni, naneŋgu paneâŋa imâ pa noko simbo nâ. Naŋa ano pano tu kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa.
Ŋana tu kinzi laŋeŋa tamwatanzi sakamao nde sikai kazâŋa pa naŋa ku situ laginâŋgu.
Naŋa ŋandai aveta vetâŋa soki panzi ŋga, andeta kinzi sikai kazâŋa pana ku sisowe ŋgua sakamao lâ tiniŋgu.
Naŋa uru tiniŋgu mwasa nâ panzi ku ano pano tu kusukanzi, andeta kinzini sitalea naŋa.
Naŋa uru aveta keŋgu ara nâ panzi, andeta kinzi sikatu kenzi sakamao imâ pa naŋa. Naŋa iloŋgu ndo ikeno panzi, andeta kinzi wisinzi nâna nâ pa naŋa.
Maro Ŋalae, kinzi nawalanzi toŋge iveta malia ŋalae tina pa naŋa. Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kupatea tamâta sakamao toŋge tu ma imandi ŋgua nia ku isowe ŋgua lâ naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde tini.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kusânda naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde ne vetâŋa soki kulu, aku kupa ŋgua ŋana kupare nia papa i kâ. Aku naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kumora i ne noŋa itogo kelekele sakamao tona.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu i ma imâte walele nâ, ŋineŋga tamâta toŋge ma ikai i nia.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu i ma imâte, aku i natu kinzi ma sipâŋga simo mundoro. Ara ŋana i kaiwa ma imo mwala!
Naŋa iloŋgu tu i natu kinzi ma simo sugorai, nenzi luma tia. Ara ŋana tamâta pinde ma siŋaranzi ŋana nenzi luma siŋga!
Ambo tamâta pinde nenzi mbuku ikeno pa naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde, ande naŋa iloŋgu tu kinzi ma simâ sikai i ne tâno tava ne kelekele rârâni. Naŋa iloŋgu tu kinzi ma sikai mbaliŋa rârâni i muŋga imakâsa ŋalae ŋana ikai ŋinde.
Naŋa tiniŋgu pwâka tu tamâta toŋge ma io ne wisi-wisi ilâ pa tamâta ŋinde, aku tiniŋgu pwâka tu tamâta toŋge ma kalo sukâŋa ŋananzi i natu simo mundoro ŋinde.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu i ne vâsa rârâni ma sipamateteu, aku kinzi tamâta sipâŋga muli-muli ŋinde ma kalonzi kapa ndo ŋana tamâta ŋinde ŋa.
Naŋa tiniŋgu pwâka tu Yova Kindeni ma izavaru naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde timbu muŋgâŋa nenzi kiesaka piti lâ tininzi! Aku naŋa iloŋgu mine nâ ŋana i tina tona!
Mao nâ, naŋa iloŋgu tu Yova Kindeni ma kalo ŋgere ŋana nenzi kiesaka kâ ikura zo rârâni. Ara ŋana i ma ivetanzi tamâta rârâni kalonzi kapa ndo ŋana kinzi ŋgu ŋinde seenzi kâ,
ŋana tu naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde ŋandai io ne wisi-wisi ilâ pa tamâta toŋge ŋga. I uru iveta kie sakamao panzi sugorai tamâta wa, kinzi tamâta nenzi kelekele tia wa, kinzi tamâta simo tava kalonzi loko wa. I ilinzi lee ipunzi pâta simâte.
I muŋga indeka ŋana ino pa Yova Kindeni tu ma iveta kie sakamao panzi tamâta pinde. Mine nde ara ŋana tamâta pinde ma sino pa Yova Kindeni tu iveta kie sakamao mine nâ pa i tamwata! I tini pwâka tu Yova Kindeni ma iveta vetâŋa ara panzi tamâta pinde. Mine nde ara ŋana Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa ara ma ikeno malawae ndo ŋana i tamwata mine nâ!
I uru iporo ŋgua sakamao mine ikura zo rârâni, itogo tamâta ipasawa pasawaŋa lâ tini mine. Ara ŋana i ne ŋgua sakamao ŋinde ma ipalele ku izavaru i tamwata!
Naŋa iloŋgu tu i ne ŋgua sakamao ŋinde ma ipâŋga itogo i ne lalava mine. Ara ŋana ŋgua ŋinde ma ilita i kaika ikura zo zo, itogo tamâta ilita wâlo lâ kambwaŋe mine.
Mao nâ, naŋa iloŋgu tu Yova Kindeni ma ipare nia mine panzi naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta, kinzi ŋinde uru siporo ŋgua soki ndo pa naŋa.
Taitu Koipu Ŋalae Yova Kindeni, naŋa ano pano tu kuvilana, ikura noko ne ŋgua pâŋa muŋgâŋa mine. Noko ne tini-mwasa ara ŋinde ikeno pa naŋa ikura zo zo. Mine nde ano pano tu pwaina piti lâ kazâŋa ilo.
Naŋa amo sugorai ndo, aku akura tu apavila warakâŋgu nde tia. Naŋa iloŋgu malia ndo.
Tini nâ nde ma naŋa naoŋgu tia lâ, itogo kari indue ku lala pararai lâ. Naŋa amo atogo ndemu-ndemu lawea itapala kala ilâ lâ.
Naŋa andi kaika ŋana kâpwa kâ ikura zo luandondo, kala tukuŋgu rua nenzi walo tia ndo. Naŋa tiniŋgu râki-râki ndo.
Naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta nde simora naŋa ku siporo ŋgua pavaligiŋa nâ pana. Kinzi sirurua kulunzi pana wa siŋeleana wa.
Naneŋgu Maro Yova Kindeni, kuvilana ŋga! Noko tini mwasa pa naŋa ikura zo rârâni. Mine kala pwaina piti lâ kazâŋa ilo!
Yova Kindeni, kutula pwataki panzi naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta tu noko tamwata simbo nâ kumo naneŋgu Pavilâŋa Tamâta.
Ambo kinzi ma sino pano tu kuzavaru naŋa, ande ara. Taitu naŋa kaloŋgu tawana tu noko ma kuveta kie ara nâ pana. Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kutawanzi tamâta ŋinde siveta kenzi sakamao pa naŋa. Ŋineŋga noko ne wurâta tamâta naŋa ma iloŋgu ara nâ.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ma mainzi ŋalae. Ara ŋana maŋeti ma ituranzi ndo lâ, itogo pasawaŋa mwasina.
Andeta naŋa ma aporo kawâŋgu ndaŋge ŋalae pa Yova Kindeni. Lâ zo ŋana i ne tamâta ma sipasau ŋana siwawa i kâ, ande naŋa ma amandi kunzi apanea i ŋa.
Ŋana tu i uru isukanzi kinzi sugorai tamwatanzi ku ikainzi piti lâ nenzi kazâŋa tamâta mbaunzi ilo, kinzi ŋinde situ sipunzi pâta simâte.
Maro Yova Kindeni itu ŋgua pa naneŋgu Maro Ŋalae mine tu, “Noko kusaŋona ŋai pa mbauŋgu wia kâ lee, ikura lâ zo ŋinde naŋa ma aonzi noko ne kazâŋa tamâta simo noko kalo.”
Maro Yova Kindeni imo Saion lawea, aku io noko tu pwai koipu pa lawea ndoni. Ara, pwai poe kaika panzi ne kazâŋa tamâta.
Mao nâ, lâ zo ŋana noko kupara kunzi ne kazâŋa tamâta, ande noko ne tamâta ma ilonzi ara tu simâ pano lâ tuu sapâŋa kulu ŋana sivilano. Noko ma pwai walo kaika ikura zo rârâni, itogo mbo mbo mwâka uru ipâŋga unza tini, kala unza ikai walo wasaseki mine.
Maro Yova Kindeni ipambwâre lâ ku iporo mine tu, “Noko koipu ŋalae ma kumo patarawâŋa tamâta mine ku kumo nâ. Noko kumo patarawâŋa tamâta ŋalae, kutogo Melikisede mine.” Yova Kindeni kawa ŋgua rârâni nde mao kanaŋo, aku i ma ilele ne ŋgua ipâŋga kie toŋge tia ndo.
Maro Yova Kindeni uru imandi noko tini laiti ŋana ivilano. Mine kala muli, lâ zo ŋana i ne wisi-nâna ma ipâŋga nia yo, ande i ma ipara kunzi koipu ŋalaŋala, ku ma ipolenzi itawanzi ndue ndo lâ.
Mao nâ, i ma ipare nia panzi tamâta ŋgu rârâni, ku ma ipunzi tamâta rârâ sipamateteu. I ma itawanzi koipu ŋalaŋala simo tâno ndoni.
Koipu Ŋalae ma ilâ pa lââ ŋinde irere nzâla ŋgaŋe, aku ma inu. Mine kala i ma ikai walo, ku ma ipole paraŋa.
Tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki! Naŋa iloŋgu kaloŋgu ndoni aporo ndaŋge ŋalae papa i. Lâ zo ŋana i ne tamâta sipasau tu siwawa i, ande naŋa ma amo kunzi ku ma kawâŋgu ndaŋge mine nâ.
Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni uru iveta vetâŋa arara nâ. Tamâta ea ilonzi ara nâ ŋana Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa kie-kie kâ, ande kinzi ŋinde rârâni uru kalonzi ŋgere sondo ŋana i ne vetâŋa ŋinde kilala kâ.
I ne vetâŋa rârâni situla i kilala pwataki tu i ŋa nde ŋalae, aku i ne walo nde kaika ndo. I uru iveta kie ara ndo panzi ne tamâta, ma iveta mine ku imo nâ.
Yova Kindeni uru igagatinzi ne tamâta ilonzi kalonzi tu ma kalonzi ŋgere ŋana i ne vetâŋa arara ŋinde kâ. I itu kinzi ma sisama tu inani nde wisi-wisi warika wa kalo-sukâŋa warika wa.
I uru kâpwa isuanzi tamâta ea simege ŋana i kâ. Aku i ma kalo kapa ŋana ŋgua pâŋa ŋinde i muŋga iveta kunzi ne tamâta, ande ma tia.
Muŋga ikai tinikoa ŋgu nenzi tâno ku ikisi keri panzi tamwata ne tamâta, aku ne vetâŋa ŋinde itula i ne kaika kilala pwataki panzi.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa rârâni nde mao kanaŋo ku sondo ndo. Mine kala kinda takura tu tapono muli pa i ne tukuŋa rârâni.
Nanayoni, lâ zo ŋinde Yova Kindeni itula ne ŋgua tukuŋa panzi ne tamâta, ande i ne vetâŋa ŋinde ipâŋga mao kanaŋo ku sondo nâ. Aku i ne ŋgua tukuŋa ŋinde ma ikeno mine ku imo nâ.
Ina kala iyautenzi ne tamâta piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, ku iveta ŋgua pâŋa kunzi. Aku ŋgua pâŋa ŋinde ma ikeno mine ku imo nâ. Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ŋa imo sapâŋa ndo; mine nde ara ŋana tamâta rârâni ma siruru ŋana i kâ.
Ambo tamâta toŋge ilo tu ipâŋga ilo-kalo tamâta, ande i ma imege ŋana Yova Kindeni muŋga lâ ŋga. Ina uru itula ilo-kalo arara panzi tamâta ea sipaloŋo pa i kawa ŋgua. Paneâŋa ilâ pa i ikura zo rârâni!
Tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki! I ne nzâmbe ara ikeno pa tamâta ea uru imege ŋana i wa ilo ara nâ ŋana ipono muli pa i ne tukuŋa wa.
Tamâta ara ŋinde natu wukale, kinzi ma simo tamâta ŋalaŋala lâ ŋgu naonzi. Aku Yova Kindeni ne nzâmbe ara ma ikeno panzi tamâta ara ŋinde timbunzi wukale mine nâ.
Tamâta ara ŋinde see taitu kinzi ma simo mbaliŋa warakanzi, aku i tamwata ne vetâŋa arara ma ikeno ikura zo zo.
Ikura zo zo, tamâta ara uru kalo sukâŋa ŋananzi tini pinde ku io ne wisi-wisi ilâ panzi, aku i ne vetâŋa rârâni nde sondo nâ. Mine kala i nde itogo sinâla ŋana isinalanzi tamâta arara simo nia ŋaŋa ilo.
Tamâta ea uru ivilanzi tini pinde ŋana mbumbu kâ ku iveta vetâŋa sondo nâ ŋana ikai mbaliŋa kâ, ande tamâta ŋinde ma imo ara nâ.
Mao nâ, ambo tamâta toŋge ipono muli sondo pa Yova Kindeni, ande tamâta ŋinde ma imo ara nâ. Aku kinzi tamâta sipâŋga muli-muli ŋinde ma siloŋo i parina.
Ambo tamâta ara mine ma iloŋo pâri tu malia pinde ma imâ ipâŋga, ande i ma iruru tia, ŋana tu i ne kalo-tawana ikeno kaika pa Yova Kindeni.
I ma iruru ku kalo loko ŋana vetâŋa toŋge tia. Isama tu Yova Kindeni ma ipolenzi ne kazâŋa tamâta.
I uru kelekele rârâ ilanzi sugorai tamwatanzi, aku ne vetâŋa arara ŋinde ma ikeno ikura zo zo. I ma imo tamâta ŋalae, aku kinzi tamâta ma sisuka i ŋa kâki.
Kinzi tamâta sakamao simora tu tamâta ara uru imo ara mine, kala simo sipadâda nâ. Kinzi wisinzi nâna lee sipayaula ku naonzi tia lâ. Aku kelekele ara ndia kinzi tamâta sakamao situ ma sikai pa warakanzi, ande ŋinde ma sikai tia.
Tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki! Miki Yova Kindeni ne wurâta tamâta, miki kasuka i ŋa kâki!
Ara ŋana paneâŋa mine nâ ma ilâ pa Yova Kindeni lâ zo ŋine wa zo muli-muli wa.
Mine nde miki tamâta kala kamo pa mbwera kâ, aŋga miki ŋinde kamo pa wâra kâ, miki rârâni kapanea Yova Kindeni kasuka i ŋa kâki!
Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni imo ikai Maro panzi tamâta ŋgu ndoni. I ŋa nde ŋalae ndo, kala ipolenzi kelekele rârâni simo samba ilo.
Mao nâ, tamâta toŋge irerege kuku kinda nenda Maro Yova Kindeni, ande tia. Ina imo âta ndo,
kala nao tundu ŋana imora nia maa wa tâno wa.
I nao tundu ŋana ivilanzi kinzi sugorai tamwatanzi, aku ikainzi piti lâ nia sakamao ilo. Tamâta ea simo sakamao ku sikura tu sipavila warakanzi tia, ande i uru isuka kinzi ŋinde kâki,
aku ionzi simo rege-rege kunzi i ne ŋgu nenzi tamâta mbâna-mbâna.
Aku i uru iveta kie ara ndo panzi taine niŋga tava. Ivilanzi kala sipaguguanzi natunzi, ande kala taine ŋinde sindeka pâta kanaŋo. Mine kala tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki!
Muŋgani, lâ zo ŋinde kinzi Isrel ŋgu sipile Isip tâno, lâ zo ŋinde Yakopu ne vâsa ŋgu sipile tinikoa ŋgu nenzi lawea,
ande lâ zoni ndaina kinzi Juda ŋgu sipâŋga Maro Kindeni ne ŋgu sapâŋa. Mao nâ, kinzi Isrel ŋgu sipâŋga i tamwata ne tamâta.
Maro Kindeni ina ipâŋga Tâi Ŋiŋi pwali, aku tâi nde ikâwa ilâ imandi pa pinde, ilâ imandi pa pinde. Ŋineŋga i ilâ lee ipâŋga Jodan Lââ pwali, aku lââ imandi nâ.
Kinzi tuu ŋalaŋala siruru kala sipapatiki sitogonzi meme mine. Aku kinzi tuu kiri-kiri kala sisoŋga pwapwataki sitogonzi lama natu mine.
Noko tâi ndai, ande vetâŋa ndia ipâŋga pano kala noko pwâwa mine, a? Aŋga noko Jodan Lââ, mana mana ŋga kurere tia, a?
Aŋga miki tuu ŋalaŋala, ande vetâŋa ndia ipâŋga pami kala kapapatiki katogonzi meme mine, a? Aŋga miki tuu kiri-kiri, mana mana ŋga kasoŋga pwapwataki katogonzi lama natu mine, a?
Mao nâ, miki kamege ŋana Maro Kindeni kâ kala kaveta mine. Noko tâno ŋai, kala ŋine Maro Ŋalae imâ ipâŋga laiti lâ. Mine kala kuririŋo ŋga! Yakopu ne Maro Kindeni nde imâ ipâŋga lâ; mine nde ara ŋana noko ma kumo kuririŋo nâ.
Ŋana tu ina iveta lââ ipâŋga mira ilo ku iyâti imâ, aku inani iveta lââ isâko mira kaika ŋalaŋala ilo ku irere ndue.
Yova Kindeni, noko ne tini-mwasa ikeno pa maka ikura zo zo, aku noko uru kuveta ikura tamwata kawa ŋgua rârâni. Mine nde maka ma kasuka noko simbo nâ ŋa kâki. Maka ma kapasuka warakama ŋama kâki, ande tia.
Ŋana sâ kâ ŋga kinzi tinikoa ŋgu uru sivaligi maka ku sikasoŋama mine tu, “Miki nemi Maro Kindeni ande imo ndia”, a?
Kinzi sizizâla tu kinda nenda Maro Kindeni imo samba ilo, aku i uru iveta ikura tamwata nâ ne pateâŋa.
Aŋga kinzi tinikoa ŋgu nenzi maro nde kelekele kaa nâ. Kinzi tamâta nâ sipare maro ŋinde tainzi lâ mira “gol” wa “silva” tini.
Kinzi maro laŋeŋa ŋinde kawanzi keno, andeta sikura tu siporo ŋgua kâ, nde tia. Kinzi matanzi keno, andeta sikura tu simora kelekele kâ, nde tia.
Kinzi taŋanzi keno, andeta sikura tu siloŋo ŋgua kâ, nde tia. Kinzi vigunzi keno, andeta sikura tu siŋo kelekele kuwae kâ, nde tia.
Kinzi mbaunzi keno, andeta sikura tu sitaŋo kelekele kâ, nde tia. Aku kinzi kenzi keno, andeta sikura tu soka kâ, nde tia. Kinzi sikura tu sisarâwa wa siveta nduŋeŋa toŋge tia.
Mine nde naŋa aporo tu kinzi tamâta kala uru sipare maro laŋeŋa kaa kaa ŋinde tainzi, ande kinzi ŋinde nde sirerege kunzi maro laŋeŋa ŋinde. Aku tamâta ea uru kalonzi tawana maro laŋeŋa ŋinde, ande kinzi kala sipâŋga kaa nâ, sitogonzi kinzi mine.
Aŋga miki Isrel ŋgu tamâta, miki ma kalomi tawana Yova Kindeni, ina uru ivilami wa ikatonami wa.
Aku miki Yova Kindeni ne patarawâŋa tamâta lâ Aron ne vâsa ŋgu, miki ma kalomi tawana Yova Kindeni, ina uru ivilami wa ikatonami wa.
Miki tamâta ŋine uru kamege ŋana Yova Kindeni kâ, miki ma kalomi tawana i nâ, ina uru ivilami wa ikatonami wa.
Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni uru kalo ŋgere ŋana kinda kâ, aku i ma iveta kie ara nâ pa kinda. I ma iveta kie ara mine nâ panzi Isrel ŋgu tamâta, sitavanzi Yova Kindeni ne patarawâŋa tamâta lâ Aron ne vâsa ŋgu.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ma iveta kie ara panzi tamâta ea simege ŋana i kâ, kinzi tamâta ŋalaŋala wa sugorai tamwatanzi wa.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu Yova Kindeni ma iveta natumi sipâŋga kambwaŋenzi walo, aku iloŋgu tu i ma iveta mine nâ panzi timbumi wukale tona.
Mao nâ, naŋa iloŋgu tu Yova Kindeni tamwata ma iveta kie ara ndo pa miki. Ina nia ndoyo ipulianzi samba wa tâno wa.
Samba nde Yova Kindeni simbo nâ ne ninia, aŋga tâno nde ilua kinda tamâta lâ.
Kinzi mateŋa tamâta silâ pa warakanzi nenzi lawea, aku sikura tu sipanea Yova Kindeni sisuka i ŋa kâki, ande tia.
Aŋga kinda nde tamo viânda yo, aku ma kawânda ndaŋge pa Yova Kindeni lâ zo ŋine wa zo muli-muli tona. Tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki!
Yova Kindeni uru ipaloŋo pa naneŋgu sarawâŋa. Mine nde naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo papa i. Mao kanaŋo, i uru ipaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa.
Ina itambira taŋa pa naneŋgu sarawâŋa rârâni. Mine nde naŋa ma amo akai noŋa pa i nâ ikura zo rârâni naŋa ma amo viâŋgu.
Muŋga, mateŋa ne nimbu nde ikai naŋa kaika lâ. Mine kala naŋa kaloŋgu ŋgere ŋana mateŋa nianzi, aku ŋinde iveta naŋa aruru pâta kanaŋo. Naŋa kaloŋgu loko ku iloŋgu malia ndo.
Ŋineŋga asarâwa pa Yova Kindeni ku apai tu, “Yova Kindeni, naŋa ano kaika pano tu kuvilana! Tia ma amâte!”
Naŋa asama tu Yova Kindeni nde wisi-wisi warika wa vetâŋa sondo warika wa. Mao nâ, kinda nenda Maro Kindeni nde kalo-sukâŋa warika.
I uru ikea ŋananzi tamâta ea sikura ŋana sipavila warakanzi tia. Mine nde lâ zo ŋana kalo-lokoni iveta iloŋgu malia ndo, ande ina ivilana.
Kala ŋine naŋa wisiŋgu puu ndue kilo, ŋana tu Yova Kindeni iveta kie ara ndo pa naŋa.
Yova Kindeni itiŋgi mateŋa piti kala iŋgeŋge ŋanana lâ. Ipamasi matâŋgu sulu mâsa-mâsa lâ, aku ikea ŋanana. Mine nde malia ŋandai itawa naŋa ndue ŋga.
Mine kala naŋa ma ayoka kuku Yova Kindeni ikura zo rârâni naŋa ma amo viâŋgu lâ tâno kulu.
Naŋa kaloŋgu tawana Yova Kindeni. Mine kala muŋga naŋa aporo lâ warakâŋgu iloŋgu mine tu, “Malia ŋalae tina itawa naŋa ndue ndo lâ.” Taitu lâ zo ŋinde, naŋa ŋandai apile naneŋgu kalo-tawana ŋga.
Lâ zo ŋinde naŋa iloŋgu rârâ kala aporo lâ warakâŋgu iloŋgu mine tu, “Tamâta rârâni nenzi ŋgua pâŋa rârâni nde laŋeŋa nâ.” Andeta naneŋgu kalo-tawana ŋandai imbe ŋga.
Opopo, Yova Kindeni iveta kie ara ndo pa naŋa. Andeta naŋa ma akatu i ne vetâŋa ŋinde mâsi mana.
Ayo, naŋa ma awuwu waini lâ kâmba ilo, ku akai amâ alua Yova Kindeni itogo patarawâŋa mine. Vetâŋa ŋinde ma itula pwataki tu naŋa kawâŋgu ndaŋge ŋalae papa i ŋana ne pavilâŋa ara ŋinde kâ.
Aku lâ zo ŋana Yova Kindeni ne tamâta rârâni ma sipasau ŋana siwâŋgi pa i kâ, ande naŋa ma amo kunzi ku ma aveta ikura naneŋgu ŋgua pâŋa muŋgâŋa mine.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ilo ndo keno panzi ne tamâta. Mine kala ambo toŋge ma imâte, ande i kalo sukâŋa ŋalae ŋinde.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa amo noko ne wurâta tamâta. Naŋa uru aveta wurâta pano, itogo nana muŋga iveta mine. Noko kutiŋgi mateŋa piti kala iŋgeŋge ŋanana, kala ŋine naŋa amo ara nâ.
Mine nde naŋa ma aveta patarawâŋa pano ŋana itula pwataki tu naŋa kawâŋgu ndaŋge ŋalae pano. Aku naŋa ma ano pa noko tona.
Aku lâ zo ŋana Yova Kindeni ne tamâta rârâni ma sipasau ŋana siwâŋgi pa i kâ, ande naŋa ma amo kunzi ku ma aveta ikura naneŋgu ŋgua pâŋa muŋgâŋa mine.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa ma aveta mine lâ Jerusalem lawea ilo, lâ noko ne luma sapâŋa ne ŋgumbi ilo. Tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki!
Miki tamâta lâ tinikoa ŋgu ndoni, miki rârâni kapanea Yova Kindeni kasuka i ŋa kâki! Miki tamâta kamo tâno ndoni, miki kawawa i!
Ŋana tu i ne tini-mwasa ikeno kaika pa kinda ku imo nâ. Ikura zo zo, ande iveta ikura i kawa ŋgua rârâni. Mine kala tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki!
Kinda ma kawânda ndaŋge ilâ pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i nde ara tamwata. I ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ.
Mine nde miki Isrel ŋgu tamâta, ara ŋana miki ma kaporo mine tu, “I ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ.”
Aŋga miki Yova Kindeni ne patarawâŋa tamâta lâ Aron ne vâsa ŋgu, miki kala ma kaporo mine tu, “I ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ.”
Aŋga miki tamâta ŋine uru kamege ŋana Yova Kindeni kâ, miki rârâni kala mine nâ ma kaporo tu, “I ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ.”
Ŋana tu muŋga, ande malia ŋalae itawa naŋa ndue lâ. Ŋineŋga naŋa ano pa Yova Kindeni, aku ipaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa kala izavaru malia ŋinde piti lâ.
Naŋa asama tu Yova Kindeni uru imo kuku naŋa. Mine kala naŋa ma aruru tia ndo, ŋana tu kinzi tamâta sikura ŋana siveta vetâŋa soki toŋge pa naŋa, ande tia.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni tamwata uru imo kuku naŋa ŋana ivilana. Mine kala naŋa ma amora i itawanzi naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta ndue ku izavarunzi ndo lâ.
Ambo kinda kalonda tawana tu kinzi tamâta ma sivila kinda, ande ŋinde nde ara koŋa tia. Andeta kaloŋo ŋga; ambo kinda talâ pa Yova Kindeni tu ikea ŋana kinda kâ, ande ŋinde nde ara ndo.
Ambo kinda kalonda tawana tu kinzi tamâta ŋalaŋala ma sivila kinda, ande ŋinde nde ara koŋa tia. Ambo kinda talâ pa Yova Kindeni tu ikea ŋana kinda kâ, ande ŋinde nde ara ndo.
Naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta rârâ nde siŋge naŋa mbwaliu lâ, andeta Yova Kindeni walo kaika ilua naŋa, kala azavarunzi lâ.
Kinzi siŋge naŋa lâ, kala simo pa naoŋgu wa muliŋgu wa tiniŋgu pa wia kâ wa tiniŋgu pa ŋâsi kâ. Andeta Yova Kindeni walo kaika ilua naŋa, kala azavarunzi lâ.
Kinzi siŋge naŋa mbwaliu lâ, itogo wuli-wuli siveta mine. Andeta Yova Kindeni walo kaika ilana, kala azavarunzi lâ. Mao nâ, kinzi sipamateteu walele nâ, itogo yââ kana leu walele nâ ŋineŋga imâte pusii lâ mine.
Kinzi kazâŋa tamâta ŋinde sipara kaika ndo kuku naŋa, aku laiti ŋana sipole naŋa kâ. Andeta Yova Kindeni ivilana.
Mine kala naŋa apaimi tu Yova Kindeni tamwata uru walo kaika ilua naŋa. Ina tamwata imo naneŋgu Pavilâŋa Tamâta.
Miki kaloŋo ŋga! Yova Kindeni ne tamâta nde simo nenzi luma ilo ku sindeka wa sikai lolove wa. Kinzi sisarâwa mine tu, “Yova Kindeni Walo Tamwata ivila kinda kala tapole paraŋa lâ!
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ne walo kaika nde ŋalae ndo! Yova Kindeni Walo Tamwata ivila kinda kala tapole paraŋa lâ.”
Aku naŋa kala ŋandai amâte lâ paraŋa ilo ŋga. Naŋa ma amo viâŋgu, ku ma atu pâri ŋana Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa ŋalaŋala ŋinde kâ.
Yova Kindeni ipu naŋa pâta lâ, andeta i ŋandai isâu pa mateŋa tu ikai naŋa ŋga.
Mine nde naŋa amandi Yova Kindeni ne luma sapâŋa nao amo ŋai. Miki kakai nzâla piti pana, ŋana naŋa ma ayoka alâ luma ilo ku ma kawâŋgu ndaŋge asuka i ŋa kâki.
Yova Kindeni ne ŋgumbi nzâla kala ŋine. Tamâta ea simo ilonzi mbâra-mbâra lâ i nao, kinzi ŋinde nâ ma sikura tu silâ luma sapâŋa ilo.
Yova Kindeni, noko kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa lâ, kala kumo naneŋgu Pavilâŋa Tamwata. Mine nde naŋa apanea noko ŋa asuka kâki.
Mira ŋine kinzi tamâta ŋana sipa luma kâ situ nde sakamao kala sitambira lâ, ande mirani ndaina ipâŋga mira ara ŋana isuka luma ŋgaŋe kaika kâ.
Yova Kindeni tamwata iveta vetâŋa ŋinde ipâŋga lâ, kala kinda tamora ŋinde tu ara pâta kanaŋo.
Kala kari ŋine kinda kalonda ŋgere ŋana Yova Kindeni ne vetâŋa ŋinde. Kinda ma tandeka ku ilonda ara nâ papa i.
Yova Kindeni, nema pavilâŋa tamwata noko, maka kano pano tu kuvilama! Kusukama ŋana nema vetâŋa rârâni ma ipâŋga kanaŋo.
Kala ŋine tamâta kala ikai Yova Kindeni ndamwa ŋinde nde ilâ luma sapâŋa ilo, aku Yova Kindeni itu nzâmbe pa koipu ŋalae ŋine ikai i ndamwa kala imâ. Maka kamo Yova Kindeni ne luma sapâŋa ilo ku kano pa i tu ma iveta kie ara pa miki.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni nde Maro Ŋalae, aku uru ikatona kinda sondo ndo. Mine nde miki kalâ kakai kâi launzi lâ mbaumi ilo, aku kao lae ku koka kalâ kakarerea patarawâŋa nia ku kapanea i.
O Maro Kindeni, noko simbo nâ kumo naneŋgu Yova Kindeni, aku kawâŋgu ndaŋge imâ pano. Mao nâ, naneŋgu Maro Kindeni noko, aku naŋa ma aporo atula pwataki tu noko ŋa imo ŋalae ndo.
Miki ma kawami ndaŋge ilâ pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i nde ara tamwata. I ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ.
Tamâta ea kinzi uru sipaveta kuku vetâŋa sondo nâ ku soka Yova Kindeni ne ŋgua tukuŋa muli, ande i ne nzâmbe ara ikeno panzi.
Ŋana tu kinzi ilonzi ndo tu sipono muli sondo pa Yova Kindeni kawa ŋgua.
Mao kanaŋo, kinzi tamâta ŋinde sipu mulinzi pa vetâŋa sakamao rârâni. Kinzi uru siveta ikura Yova Kindeni nâ ne pateâŋa mine.
Yova Kindeni, nanayoni noko kutula ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni pama, aku kutu ŋgua kaika pama tu maka ma kapakatona sondo ŋana kapono muli sondo nâ pa ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni.
Mine nde naŋa iloŋgu tu aveta ikura noko ne pateâŋa mine ikura zo rârâni!
Naŋa asama tu ambo naŋa ma kaloŋgu ŋgere sondo ŋana noko ne tukuŋa rârâni, ande naŋa ma maiŋgu lâ tamâta naonzi tia ndo.
Naŋa ma apanâna ŋana noko ne pateâŋa sondo rârâni. Ŋineŋga naŋa ma apanea noko ŋa asuka kâki tava iloŋgu mbâra-mbâra ndo.
Naŋa ma apono muli pa noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni. Mine kala noko ma kupu muli ndo pa naŋa ndimo!
Ambo tamâta limoa itu ipakatona tamwata ne vetâŋa ŋana imo mbâra-mbâra lâ noko nao, ande i ma ipaveta kuku noko ne ŋgua.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa ŋandai iloŋgu rua-rua ŋga. Naŋa iloŋgu ndo tu apono muli pa noko. Mine nde ano pano tu pwai poe sondo pana, aku kupono nzalâŋgu ŋana naŋa ma akura tu apu muliŋgu pa noko ne tukuŋa tia kâ.
Naŋa tiniŋgu pwâka tu ma aveta kiesaka toŋge pa noko. Mine kala naŋa ao noko kawa ŋgua ikeno kaika lâ iloŋgu kaloŋgu marumbu lâ.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa apanea noko ŋa asuka kâki. Naŋa ano pano tu kupananana ŋana noko ne pateâŋa kâ.
Ambo noko ma kupananana, ande naŋa ma aporo atula tukuŋa rârâni muŋga kulama ŋinde pwataki.
Mao nâ, naŋa iloŋgu ndeka ndo ŋana apono muli pa noko kawa ŋgua, aku ŋinde ipole naneŋgu ndekâŋa ŋana naneŋgu mbaliŋa rârâni.
Naŋa uru kaloŋgu ŋgere ŋana vetâŋa rârâni noko ilo tu naŋa ma aveta ŋinde, aku matâŋgu alea sondo pa noko ne ŋgua rârâni.
Naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo pa noko ne pateâŋa. Naŋa ma kaloŋgu kapa ŋana noko ne ŋgua ŋinde kâ, ande ma tia.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa ano pano tu kuveta kie ara pa ne wurâta tamâta naŋa. Ambo noko ma kuveta mine, ande naŋa ma amo viâŋgu nâ ku ma apono muli pa noko ne ŋgua.
Pwai iloŋgu kaloŋgu ne nzâla piti, ŋana naŋa ma asama sondo ŋana ŋgua arara rârâni ikeno noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa tini.
Naŋa nde tamâta nâ, kala akura tu amo zo luandondo lâ tâno ŋine kulu, ande tia. Mine nde noko ma kuvea ne ŋgua tukuŋa ŋanana ndimo.
Ikura kari wa mbo wa, ande naŋa iloŋgu ndo tu apono muli pa noko ne pateâŋa, aku ŋinde ipâŋga itogo yââ mela-mela mine lâ iloŋgu kaloŋgu.
Naŋa asama tu noko uru pwai kazâŋa panzi tamâta ea sipasuka warakanzi tininzi, aku noko ma kuzavarunzi tamâta ea silaŋa sipole noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa.

Aku kinzi tamâta ŋalaŋala sipasau ku siporo sipa ŋgua ŋana siyaula naŋa kâ. Andeta kalo loko, naŋa nde noko ne wurâta tamâta, aku ma kaloŋgu ŋgere sondo ŋana noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa kâ.

aku naŋa atu apono muli sondo papa. Noko nde vetâŋa sondo warika. Mine nde ano pano tu via wasaseki kulana.

Mine kala naŋa iloŋgu patea tu naŋa ma ayoka noko ne tukuŋa rârâni muli nâ, ikura zo rârâni naŋa ma amo viâŋgu.
Yova Kindeni, tamâta pinde kawanzi nâ siporo tu kinzi uru sipono muli pa noko, andeta nenzi ŋgua ŋinde nde laŋeŋa nâ. Naŋa tiniŋgu pwâka ndo ŋananzi tamâta ŋinde, andeta tiniŋgu mwasa ndo pa noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa.
Noko tamwata nâ kumo kutogo naneŋgu munâŋa nia wa naneŋgu maramuŋa wa. Naŋa kaloŋgu tawana noko ne ŋgua pâŋa.
Miki kiesaka tamwatami, miki kapile naŋa ku kakâwa kalâ! Naŋa atu apono muli pa naneŋgu Maro Kindeni ne tukuŋa.
Yova Kindeni, noko kupambwâre tu ma walo kaika kulua naŋa, aku naŋa kaloŋgu tawana ne ŋgua pâŋa ŋinde. Kala ŋine naŋa ano pano tu kaika ŋinde kulana, ŋana naŋa ma amo viâŋgu kâ. Tia ma naneŋgu kalo-tawana ŋine ilâ kaa nâ, ne kanaŋo tia.
Andeta naŋa asama tu ambo noko ma kusaŋa mbauŋgu kaika, ande naŋa ma amo ara nâ, ku ma apaveta kuku noko kawa ŋgua ikura zo rârâni.
Noko uru kupu muli panzi tamâta ea silaŋa sipole noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa. Nenzi ilo-kalo laŋeŋa ŋinde ma kanaŋo tia ndo.
Mao nâ, kinzi tamâta sakamao rârâni nde simo sitogo kina mine lâ noko nao. Mine kala naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo pa noko ne ŋgua.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa aruru pâta ŋanano. Naŋa kaloŋgu ŋgere ŋana noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa, kala tiniŋgu ruru nâ.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa uru apaveta kuku vetâŋa ara ku vetâŋa sondo nâ. Mine nde noko ma kusâu panzi naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta tu siveta soki pa naŋa, mine ndimo.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kupambwâre ŋana kuvila ne wurâta tamâta naŋa. Noko ma kusâu panzi tamâta uru sipasuka warakanzi tininzi ŋinde tu siveta kenzi sakamao pa naŋa, mine ndimo.
Naŋa ao matâŋgu tu ma amora noko kumâ ŋana pwaina piti lâ kinzi tamâta sakamao mbaunzi ilo, ikura muŋga noko kupa ŋgua tu ma kuveta mine. Naŋa ao matâŋgu mine lee, matâŋgu sakamao lâ.
Yova Kindeni, noko ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ. Kala ŋine ano pano tu kuo ne tini-mwasa ŋinde imâ pa ne wurâta tamâta naŋa mine nâ. Aku naŋa kala ano pano tu kupananana sondo ŋana noko ne pateâŋa kâ tona.
Mao nâ, naŋa amo noko ne wurâta tamâta. Mine nde ano pano tu kutula ilo-kalo ara pana, ŋana naŋa ma asama noko kawa ŋgua ne duvi kâ.
Yova Kindeni, kinzi tamâta silaŋa sipole noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa. Mine kala ŋine nâ kumandi ku kuveta nâna panzi!
Ŋana tu naŋa iloŋgu ŋalae koŋa pa mira “gol” nde tia, taitu naŋa iloŋgu ndo keno pa noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa.
Mine kala naŋa uru ayoka noko kawa ŋgua rârâni muli. Aku naŋa tiniŋgu pwâka ndo ŋana mâsi sakamao rârâni.
Yova Kindeni, noko ne ŋgua nde ara pâta kanaŋo. Mine kala naŋa uru apaveta sondo kuku.
Lâ zo ŋana noko kutula ne ŋgua duvi pwataki panzi tamâta, ande ŋgua ŋinde imo itogo sinâla mine panzi. Mao nâ, noko kawa ŋgua uru itula ilo-kalo ara panzi tamâta ŋinde nenzi ilo-kalo ŋalae koŋa tia.
Opopo, naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo pa noko ne tukuŋa, aku iloŋgu gagatina ndo ŋana apono muli papa!
Mine kala naŋa ano pano tu kuwara nao pana ku kalo sukâŋa ŋanana, itogo uru kuveta panzi tamâta rârâni ŋine tininzi mwasa nâ pano.
Pwai poe sondo nâ pana, ikura muŋga noko kupa ŋgua tu ma kuveta mine. Noko ma kusâu panzi kiesaka tamwatanzi tu ma sipole naŋa, mine ndimo.
Pwaina piti lâ kinzi tamâta uru siveta kenzi sakamao pa naŋa ŋinde mbaunzi ilo, ŋana naŋa ma akura tu apono muli pa noko kawa ŋgua.
O Yova Kindeni, kuveta kie ara pa ne wurâta tamâta naŋa, aku kumo kuna kupananana ŋana noko ne pateâŋa rârâni kâ.
Noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa nde ara ndo, taitu tamâta rârâ tininzi pwâka ŋana. Mine kala naŋa ata pâta, kala matâŋgu sulu irere ndue itogo lââ mine.
Yova Kindeni, noko nde vetâŋa sondo warika, aku ne pateâŋa rârâni nde ara ku sondo nâ.
Ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni kala kupatea pama ŋinde nde sondo ndo, ma ikeno mine ku imo nâ.
Andeta naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta tininzi pwâka ŋana noko ne tukuŋa kâ. Mine nde naŋa wisiŋgu nâna ndo, itogo yââ mwasina.
Ŋana tu noko ne ŋgua pâŋa kilala ipâŋga nia yo tu ŋinde nde ŋgua mao kanaŋo, aku noko ne wurâta tamâta naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo papa.
Naŋa nde tamâta kaa nâ, aku kinzi tamâta uru siporo situ naŋa laginâŋgu. Taitu naŋa ŋandai kaloŋgu kapa ŋana noko ne ŋgua ŋga.
Ŋana tu noko ne vetâŋa rârâni nde ara nâ, ma ikeno mine ku imo nâ, aku ne tukuŋa rârâni nde mao kanaŋo.
Kalo-lokoni tava malia kie-kie nde uru ipâŋga pa naŋa, andeta iloŋgu ndeka nâ ŋana noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa kâ.
Yova Kindeni, noko kawa ŋgua nde sondo ndo, ma ikeno mine ku imo nâ. Ambo noko ma kutula ilo-kalo ara pa naŋa, ande naŋa ma apono muli papa ku ma akura tu amo viâŋgu.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa iloŋgu kaloŋgu ndoni asarâwa kaika pa noko. Kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa, aku naŋa ma aveta ikura noko ne pateâŋa mine.
Kala ŋine naŋa asarâwa pano. Kuvila naŋa, aku naŋa ma apono muli pa noko ne tukuŋa rârâni.
Ikura mbo mbo, naŋa ŋandai akeno ŋga. Naŋa matâŋgu pareŋge nâ ku kaloŋgu ŋgere ŋana noko ne ŋgua pambwareŋa kâ. Mbwale pwataki tia yo, ande naŋa amandi sânda ku ano pano tu kusukana. Naŋa kaloŋgu tawana noko ne ŋgua pâŋa.
<range>
Yova Kindeni, noko ne tini-mwasa ikeno pa naŋa mine ku imo nâ. Mine kala kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa! Noko nde vetâŋa sondo warika. Mine nde pwea ŋanana lâ naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta naonzi, ŋana ma amo viâŋgu kâ.
Ŋana tu kinzi tamâta sakamao situ siyaula naŋa, aku kinzi ŋinde simâ sipâŋga laiti lâ. Kinzi tininzi pwâka ndo ŋana noko ne tukuŋa.
Andeta Yova Kindeni, nokoni uru kumo naŋa tiniŋgu laiti, aku asama tu noko ne tukuŋa rârâni nde mao kanaŋo.
Siŋgani naŋa apanâna ŋana noko kawa ŋgua kâ, aku asama mine; noko kupatea tu ŋgua ŋinde ma ikeno kaika mine ku imo nâ.
Yova Kindeni, kumora ŋga; naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta siveta kenzi sakamao ndo pa naŋa. Naŋa ano pano tu pwaina piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, ŋana tu naŋa ŋandai kaloŋgu kapa ŋana noko ne tukuŋa ŋga.
Kusuka naneŋgu ŋgua lâ ŋgua nia, aku kuyaute naŋa piti! Pwea ŋanana, ikura muŋga noko kupa ŋgua tu ma kuveta mine.
Kinzi tamâta sakamao tininzi pwâka tu soka noko ne tukuŋa muli. Mine kala noko ma kuvilanzi ku pwainzi piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, ande ma tia.
Yova Kindeni, noko ne kalo-sukâŋa nde ŋalae tina, aku noko nde vetâŋa sondo warika. Mine nde pwea ŋanana lâ naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta naonzi, ŋana ma amo viâŋgu kâ.
Tamâta rârâ sikai kazâŋa pa naŋa kala situ siveta kenzi sakamao pana. Andeta naŋa apu muliŋgu pa noko ne ŋgua mao ŋinde tia ndo.
Lâ zo ndia naŋa amoranzi tamâta ŋinde kala muŋga sipu mulinzi pa noko, ande naŋa wisiŋgu nâna ndo ŋananzi, ŋana tu kinzi silaŋa sipole noko ne tukuŋa.
Yova Kindeni, kumora ŋga! Naŋa iloŋgu ndo ikeno pa noko ne ŋgua. Noko ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ; mine nde pwea ŋanana, aku naŋa ma amo viâŋgu.
Noko kawa ŋgua kilala ipâŋga nia yo tu ŋinde nde mao kanaŋo. Aku noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni nde sondo ndo, ma ikeno mine ku imo nâ.
Yova Kindeni, kinzi tamâta ŋalaŋala nde siveta kenzi sakamao koa tia nâ pa naŋa. Taitu naŋa amege ndo ŋana noko kawa ŋgua nâ.
Naŋa iloŋgu ndeka pâta kanaŋo ŋana noko ne ŋgua pâŋa kâ, itogo tamâta indeka ŋana ikai mbaliŋa arara kie-kie mine.
Naŋa tiniŋgu pwâka ndo ŋana vetâŋa laŋeŋa rârâni kâ. Aŋga noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa, ande naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo papa.
Ikura kari kari, ande naŋa uru kawâŋgu ndaŋge pano mbwaniŋgu rârâ, ŋana tu noko ne pateâŋa rârâni nde sondo ndo.
Mao nâ, tamâta ea ilonzi ndo keno pa noko ne tukuŋa, ande kinzi ŋinde rârâni uru simo ara ndo, aku malia toŋge ikura ŋana itawanzi ndue kâ, ande tia.
Mine nde Yova Kindeni, naŋa ao tiniŋgu nâ ŋanano tu ma pwaina piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, aku naŋa uru aveta ikura noko ne pateâŋa mine.
Naŋa uru ayoka noko kawa ŋgua rârâni muli. Naŋa tiniŋgu mwasa ndo papa ŋgua ŋinde.
Naneŋgu vetâŋa rârâni nde ikeno nia yo lâ noko nao. Mine kala noko kusama tu naŋa apono muli pa noko ne ŋgua wa tukuŋa rârâni.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa asarâwa pano tu kuvilana. Kutambira taŋa pa naŋa, aku kutula ilo-kalo ara pana, itogo muŋga noko kupa ŋgua tu ma kuveta mine.
Kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa ku pwaina piti lâ kazâŋa ilo, ikura ne ŋgua pambwareŋa muŋgâŋa ŋinde.
Noko uru kupanana naŋa sondo ŋana ne pateâŋa rârâni kâ. Mine nde naŋa ma apanea noko ŋa asuka kâki ikura zo zo.
Mao nâ, naŋa ma awâŋgi wâŋgiŋa ŋana noko kawa ŋgua ŋinde kâ, ŋana tu noko ne tukuŋa rârâni nde ara ku sondo ndo.
Naŋa iloŋgu patea tu ma apono muli pa noko kawa ŋgua. Mine kala ano pano tu kuluku ŋana kuvila naŋa ikura zo rârâni.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa iloŋgu ndo tu noko ma kuvilana ku pwaina piti lâ kazâŋa ilo. Aku iloŋgu ndeka nâ ŋana noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa kâ.
Ambo noko ma pwatona naneŋgu via, ande naŋa ma apanea noko ŋa asuka kâki. Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ne ŋgua ma ikai poe sondo pa naŋa.
Naŋa aŋgeŋge ŋana nzâla ara kâ, itogo lama isapiri kala izizâla ŋana nia kâ. Naŋa ano pano tu kumâ kuroto ŋana ne wurâta tamâta naŋa, ŋana tu naŋa ŋandai kaloŋgu kapa ŋana noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa ŋga.
Lâ zo ndia malia itu imâ ipâŋga pa naŋa, ande naŋa asarâwa pa Yova Kindeni, aku ipaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa.
Naŋa akai noŋa mine tu, “Yova Kindeni, kinzi laŋeŋa tamwatanzi situ sizavaru naŋa. Kuvilana ŋga!”
Aŋga miki laŋeŋa tamwatami, miki kaloŋo ŋga; Yova Kindeni ma iveta mâsi kaika pami, ku ma ipare nia sondo ndo pami.
I ma silâwa nâ ipanemi, aku ma iliŋi yââ lâ tinimi.
Opopo, naŋa amo miki tamâta sakamao ŋginimi kala amo sakamao ndo. Ŋinde nde kie taituni itogo naŋa amo kunzi tamâta ŋgoi simo Mesek tâno wa Kedar tâno wa.
Oyae, naŋa amo zo luandondo koŋa kunzi tamâta ŋine uru ilonzi pa paraŋa nâ.
Lâ zo ndia naŋa aporo ŋgua panzi ŋana kamo tava iloma pisi, ande kinzi situ sipara nâ.
Naŋa matâŋgu kâki alea pa nia tuu, aroto ŋana naneŋgu pavilâŋa tamâta. Aku apakasoŋa warakâŋgu tu, “Naneŋgu pavilâŋa tamâta nde ma iyoka pa sinia imâ.”
Ŋineŋga naneŋgu ilo-kalo ipâŋga tu Yova Kindeni nanayoni ipulia samba wa tâno wa, aku ina simbo nâ imo naneŋgu Pavilâŋa Tamwata.
I ma mbau piti lâ noko tini kala patano kundue, ande ma tia. Noko ne katonâŋa tamâta ŋinde ma ikeno mata tia ndo.
Kuloŋo sondo ŋga; ina uru ikea ŋananzi Isrel ŋgu, aku i ŋana mata tutu ku ikeno utu kâ, ande tia ndo kanaŋo.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni nde imo noko ne katonâŋa tamâta mao. Ina kala uru imandi noko tini laiti ku ikea ŋanano.
Mine nde kari ma ikura tu ikana noko tini, ande tia, aŋga nzimona kala ma ikura tu iyaula noko lâ mbo, ande ma tia.
Yova Kindeni ma ikea sondo ndo ŋanano. Mine kala vetâŋa sakamao toŋge ma ikura tu izavaruno, ande tia. Ina ma ikatona noko sondo ndo.
Yova Kindeni ma ikea ŋanano ikura nia ndia rârâni noko kumo ŋinde, ma iveta mine ku imo nâ.
Kinzi sipai naŋa mine tu, “Ayo, toka talâ pa Yova Kindeni ne luma sapâŋa.” Kinzi siporo mine, kala iloŋgu ndeka ndo.
O Jerusalem lawea, kala ŋine maka kamâ kapâŋga lâ, aku kamandi noko ne ŋgumbi ilo.
Mao nâ, kinzi siveta Jerusalem ipâŋga lawea kaika ku ara ndo.
Yova Kindeni ne tamâta rârâni uru silâ pa lawea ŋine ŋana siporo kawanzi ndaŋge ilâ pa i, ikura muŋga itu tukuŋa panzi Isrel ŋgu tu ma siveta mine.
Ikura mbwera mbwera, Isrel ne koipu ŋalae uru imo lawea ŋine, aku isaŋona ŋgua nia ŋana itu tamâta nenzi ŋgua sondo kâ.
Miki naneŋgu ŋgu, ara ŋana miki ma kano pa Yova Kindeni tu ma ivetanzi tamâta simo lawea ŋine tu simo ara nâ. Miki ma kakai noŋa mine, “Kinzi tamâta ea tininzi mwasa pa Jerusalem lawea, ande naŋa iloŋgu tu kinzi ŋinde ma simo ara nâ.
Ŋana tu naŋa iloŋgu tu kinzi tamâta ma sisaŋona sondo ndo lâ Jerusalem lawea ne ŋgumbi ilo, ŋana kazâŋa toŋge ma ikura tu isânda kulunzi tia. Aku naŋa iloŋgu tu koipu ŋalae tavanzi tamâta mbâna-mbâna rârâni kala ma sisaŋona sondo mine nâ.”
Aku naŋa iloŋgu ŋananzi niŋgu-nambwe wukale wa neŋgu mete kinzi simo Jerusalem lawea tona. Mine nde naŋa ma aporo panzi tamâta ŋinde simo Jerusalem lawea mine tu, “Naŋa iloŋgu tu miki ma kamo ilomi kalomi taitu nâ.”
Naŋa iloŋgu tu nenda Maro Yova Kindeni ne luma sapâŋa ma ikeno ara nâ. Mine kala naŋa ma ano pa i tu ma iveta kie ara nâ pa Jerusalem lawea.
Yova Kindeni, noko kumo koipu ŋalae lâ samba ilo, kala matâŋgu kâki akai noŋa pano.
Maka nema Maro Yova Kindeni, maka ma kao tinima pano lee ikura lâ zo ndia noko ma kuo ne wisi-wisi imâ pama. Mao nâ, maka ma kao tinima pano, itogo wurâta tamâta uru io tini pa ne tamâta ŋalae tu ma iveta kie ara papa, aku itogo kuleŋa taine kala uru io tini mine nâ pa ne taine ŋalae.
Yova Kindeni, kalo sukâŋa ŋanama! Tamâta rârâ situ maka nde sugorai tamwatama, kala simo siveta kenzi sakamao nâ pama. Mine nde kalo sukâŋa ŋanama!
Mao nâ, muŋgani yo, aku imâ lee ipâŋga lâ zo ŋine, ande kinzi mbaliŋa warakanzi simo nâ siveta “a” pama. Kinzi sipasuka warakanzi tininzi ku sitawa maka ndue ndo.
Muŋga, ambo Yova Kindeni ivila kinda tia, ande kinda ma tamo viânda, tiya? Kala ŋine miki Isrel tamâta kaporo katula ŋgua pwataki ŋana ŋinde kâ mine tu,
“Muŋga, lâ zo ŋinde nenda kazâŋa tamâta sipara kuku kinda, ambo Yova Kindeni ivila kinda tia, ande kinzi kazâŋa tamâta ma wisinzi nâna ŋalae tina ku ma sizavaru kinda marumbu lâ.
<range>
Kinda ma naonda tia lâ, itogo uŋara ikai tamâta ilâ pa tâi geza-geza mwasina, aku itogo lââ pondi kâki ku ipatuku tamâta mine.
Kinzi kazâŋa tamâta ma sizavaru kinda ndo lâ, itogo tamâta imbwatuke lâ lââ ŋalae ilo ku imâte mine. Andeta tia.”
Mine kala kawânda ndaŋge ilâ pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i ŋandai isâu panzi nenda kazâŋa tamâta tu sizavaru kinda ŋga.
Kinda takâwa ŋananzi, itogo sii ipatâpa piti lâ kambâru siŋi ku ilou ilâ. Kambâru siŋi ŋinde nde kaika tia, kala takâwa talâ marumbu lâ.
Nia ndoyo Yova Kindeni ipulia samba wa tâno wa, aku inani simbo nâ imo nenda Pavilâŋa Tamwata.
Tamâta ea kinzi uru kalonzi tawana Yova Kindeni, kinzi ŋinde nde sitogo Saion Tuu mine. Sâ toŋge ikura tu iririŋo tuu ŋinde yâti taulo ande tia, ma ikeno kaika mine ku imo nâ.
Tuu ŋalaŋala pinde simandi siŋge Jerusalem lawea, aku lâ zo ŋine wa zo muli-muli wa, ande Yova Kindeni kala ma ipâŋga itogo ŋgumbi mine panzi ne tamâta, ku ma ikea ŋananzi mine nâ.
Nanayoni ina ikisi tâno ne keri panzi ne tamâta, taitu kala zo ŋine kinzi tamâta sakamao sikai maro pa tâno ŋinde. Andeta kinzi ma sikura tu siveta mine ikura zo rârâni, ande tia. Ambo kinzi ma sikura tu siveta mine, tiambo Yova Kindeni ne tamâta kala ma sipaveta kuku mâsi sakamao mine tâ.
Yova Kindeni, maka tinima pwâka tu kinzi ma siveta mine. Mine kala kano pano tu kuveta kie ara panzi tamâta arara, kinzi ŋine uru sipono muli pa noko kawa ŋgua.
Andeta lâ zo ŋana noko ma kupare nia panzi tamâta sakamao, ande maka iloma tu noko ma kupare nia mine nâ panzi tamâta pinde tona, kinzi ŋinde sipu mulinzi pano ku siveta ikura warakanzi nâ nenzi ilo-kalo potomule mine. Aku maka kano pano tu kuvetanzi Isrel tamâta simo ara nâ.
Muŋga, lâ zo ŋinde Yova Kindeni ikai maka piti lâ tinikoa nenzi luma sakamao nia, aku ikai maka kataulo kamâ pa Jerusalem lawea kilo, ande maka iloma patea tu ŋinde nde mbupuleŋa nâ. Andeta tia.
Mine nde maka kaŋele ku kandeka ŋalae, aku kawama kâki kawâŋgi wâŋgiŋa ndekâŋa kâ. Ŋineŋga kinzi tinikoa ŋgu tamâta nde simora ku siporo pa warakanzi mine tu, “Opopo, Yova Kindeni iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala kie-kie ŋana ivilanzi i tamwata ne ŋgu!”
Mao kanaŋo, Yova Kindeni iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala kie-kie ŋana ivila maka, kala iloma ara ndo.
Yova Kindeni, maka kano pano tu pwaima piti lâ kazâŋa ilo kilo, itogo muŋga kuveta mine. Noko uru kusupwa karâzi imbe ndue lââ kawa-kawa mâsa-mâsa ilo, kala lââ isâko ipipi lâ kawa-kawa ilo, aku maka iloma tu noko ma kuveta vetâŋa kie taituni pa maka.
Muŋga, lâ zo ŋinde kinzi tamâta sikai kaniŋa vâsa silâ nenzi tâno ilo ŋana sipau kâ, ande kinzi kalonzi sukâŋa kala simo sipataiŋa nâ. Aŋga lâ zo ŋana kinzi ma sigona kâpwa kanaŋo, ande kinzi ma sindeka ŋalae. Aku maka kala kaloma sukâŋa mine nâ, andeta iloma tu ma kandeka kilo.
Mao nâ, maka katogonzi tamâta ŋinde muŋga silâ pa nenzi tâno ŋana sipau kaniŋa vâsa kâ, andeta ilonzi tiŋa nâ. Andeta muli ŋga kâpwa ma ipâŋga, kala kinzi ma kawanzi kâki siwâŋgi wâŋgiŋa ndekâŋa kâ, aku ma sikai kâpwa ŋalae ŋinde sitaulo simâ.
Lâ zo ŋana kinzi tamâta sipa luma kâki kâ, ambo kinzi ŋandai sino pa Yova Kindeni tu ivilanzi, ande kinzi siveta nenzi wurâta koa tia nâ. Aku mine nâ, ambo ŋgu toŋge ŋandai sino pa Yova Kindeni tu ikatona nenzi lawea, ande kinzi yoŋa tamâta sio ŋana lawea ŋinde koa tia nâ.
Aku mine nâ, tamâta pinde kalonzi kapa ŋana Yova Kindeni kâ, kala simakâsa ŋana sikai mbaliŋa wa kâpwa wa. Ikura zo zo, kinzi sipile kenoŋa nia lâ mboyo ŋaŋa yo, aku sinâna siveta wurâta ŋalae lee mbo. Andeta kinzi siveta mine koa tia nâ. Taitu Yova Kindeni ilo ndo keno panzi ne tamâta, kala lâ zo ŋana sikeno kenoŋa nia yo, ande i uru irombonzi.
Tamâta toŋge natu nde sitogo wisi-ara Yova Kindeni ilua i mine. Mao nâ, kinda natunda sitogo kulu ara i tamwata ipatea pa kinda.
Ambo tamâta lâlu ipulianzi natu, ande kinzi ŋinde ma muli sikatona i sondo, itogo zugu tamâta ne silâwa uru ikatona i mine.
Mao nâ, ambo tamâta toŋge natu rârâ simo, ande i ma indeka nâ, ŋana tu lâ zo ŋana ne kazâŋa tamâta ma sio i lâ ŋgua nia, ande i natu ŋinde ma sivila i ŋana ipolenzi kâ.
Noko tamâta ea uru kumege ŋana Yova Kindeni wa kupono muli pa i ne ŋgua wa, ande i ne nzâmbe ara ikeno pano.
Aku mbaliŋa ndia noko pwai ŋana ne wurâta kulu, ande ŋinde ma ikurano. Mao nâ, noko ma kumo ara nâ, aku ma ilo ndeka nâ.
Noko kaiwa taine ma imo noko ne luma ilo itogo kâi waini ara ipula kanaŋo rârâ mwasina. Mao nâ, i ma ipaguguanzi noko natu rârâ, aku kinzi ma siŋge noko ne kâro-kâro mbwaliu lâ, itogo kâi mbimu irumba wasaseki mine.
Mao kanaŋo, Yova Kindeni ma iveta kie ara mine panzi tamâta rârâni uru sipono muli pa i kawa ŋgua.
Niŋgu-nambwe, Yova Kindeni imo Saion lawea, aku naŋa iloŋgu tu i ma iveta kie ara mine pa noko. Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kusaŋona ara nâ lâ Jerusalem lawea, ikura zo rârâni noko ma kumo via lâ tâno kulu.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu noko ma kumo zo luandondo lee, kumoranzi timbu sipâŋga. Aku naŋa ano pa Yova Kindeni tu ma ivetanzi Isrel tamâta simo ara nâ.
Miki Isrel ŋgu, kala ŋine miki ma katapâri ŋana vetâŋa sakamao ŋinde nemi kazâŋa tamâta siveta pami, lâ nia ndoyo lee imâ ipâŋga lâ zo ŋine.
“Mao nâ, nia ndoyo, aku imâ lee ipâŋga lâ zo ŋine, ande kinzi kazâŋa tamâta simo siveta vetâŋa sakamao ndo pa maka. Andeta kinzi ŋandai sipole maka ŋga.
Kinzi uru sipalili maka sakamao ndo, aku mbilâo ive kumbuma karae pwapwataki. Mine nde mbwatakâe luandondo rârâ sipâŋga kumbuma, itogo lââ kawa-kawa ikeno tâno ilo mwasina.
Andeta Yova Kindeni, ina Vetâŋa Sondo Warika, ande ivila maka ku ipalalana tamâta sakamao nenzi wâlo kaika piti lâ tinima, kala kamo tinima vesa nâ.”
Mine kala naŋa iloŋgu tu kinzi tamâta rârâni uru ilonzi sakamao pa Saion lawea ŋinde ma mainzi, ku ma sikâwa pwapwataki silâ.
Ara ndo ŋana kinzi ma simo sitogo unza ipâŋga nia mira mwasina. Unza ŋinde ma ipâŋga wasaseki, andeta ŋgâla-ŋgâla walele nâ.
Unza ŋinde nde kelekele kaa nâ. Mine kala tamâta uru silamo ŋineŋga sipa wâra ku sikale silâ, ande tia.
Lâ kaniŋa gonâŋa ne zo, ambo tamâta pinde soka nzâla silâ, ande kinzi uru sisarâwa panzi wurâta tamâta tu, “Yova Kindeni iveta kie ara pano!”. Aku kinzi wurâta tamâta kala siporo ŋgua kaŋa taituni taulo panzi. Andeta maka tinima pwâka tu tamâta toŋge ma iporo ŋgua kaŋa mine panzi Saion lawea ne kazâŋa tamâta.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa iloŋgu malia ndo kala asarâwa pano.
Maro Ŋalae, kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu tiŋa. Naŋa asarâwa pano tu kalo sukâŋa ŋanana. Mine nde kutambira taŋa pa naneŋgu sarawâŋa!
Ambo noko ma kalo ŋgere ŋana maka nema kiesaka rârâni taitu-taitu ikura zo zo, ande ea ma ikura tu iŋgeŋge ŋana noko ne pareŋa-nia, a? Tia ndo!
Andeta noko kuzavaru nema kiesaka piti lâ tinima, ŋana tu noko ilo tu maka ma kamege ŋanano.
Mine nde naŋa ao tiniŋgu pa Yova Kindeni. Mao nâ, naŋa amo ao tiniŋgu papa i nâ tu ma ivilana, ikura ne ŋgua pâŋa mine, aku naŋa kaloŋgu tawana i ne ŋgua.
Naŋa uru ao tiniŋgu pa Maro Ŋalae nâ tu ma ivilana, itogo kinzi yoŋa tamâta uru mbo mbo sio tininzi pa mbwale pwataki mine. Kinzi ilonzi ŋalae tu mbwale pwataki ma imâ walele nâ, ŋana ma simo ara.
Aŋga miki Isrel tamâta, miki kala ma kao tinimi pa Yova Kindeni nâ, ŋana tu i ne tini-mwasa ikeno mine ku imo nâ. Ikura zo rârâni i ilo ara nâ ŋana ikainzi ne tamâta piti lâ kazâŋa ilo.
Mao nâ, inani ma izavaru i ne tamâta nenzi kiesaka rârâni piti lâ tininzi.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa apile mâsi ŋana apandekâna warakâŋgu kâ marumbu lâ, aku ŋandai uru apasuka warakâŋgu tiniŋgu ŋga. Ilo-kalo pinde nde kaika ndo kala ipole naneŋgu ilo-kalo, andeta naŋa kaloŋgu loko ŋana ilo-kalo ŋinde kâ, ande tia.
Mao nâ, naŋa wisiŋgu puu ndue lâ, kala amo tava wisiŋgu pisi nâ, itogo lâlu puro-puro wisi pisi ŋana imo tina tini laiti.
Miki Isrel tamâta, miki ma kao tinimi pa Yova Kindeni nâ, lâ zo ŋine wa zo muli-muli wa.
Yova Kindeni, maka kano pano tu kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana Daviti tava malia kie-kie muŋga ipâŋga pa i ŋinde.
Noko nde Yakopu ne vâsa ŋgu nenzi Maro Kindeni Walo Tamwata, aku maka kano pano tu kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana ŋgua pâŋa kaika ŋinde Daviti iveta kuku noko, aku kuvila i.
Daviti ipambwâre mine tu, “Naŋa ma atu kaika ŋana alâ naneŋgu luma ilo wa akeno naneŋgu kenoŋa nia wa.
Naŋa ma apwarea ku akeno matâŋgu tia ndo.
Naŋa ma aka mâsa mine lee, ikura lâ zo ndia naŋa ma apa luma toŋge kâki pa Yova Kindeni, inani Yakopu ne vâsa ŋgu nenzi Maro Kindeni Walo Tamwata, ŋana i ma imo ilo kâ.”
Muŋga, lâ zo ŋinde maka kamo Betlehem lawea, ande maka kaloŋo ŋgua tu Yova Kindeni ne ŋgua pâŋa ne sopi sapâŋa nde ikeno nia toŋge. Maka karoto lee kasânda kulu lâ Jar lawea tini laiti.
Ŋineŋga maka kaporo tu, “Ayo, toka talâ pa Yova Kindeni ne luma sapâŋa! Talâ pa i ne saŋonâŋa nia ara ŋinde nao, aku tapare tukunda tawâŋgi papa i!”
Yova Kindeni, sopi sapâŋa ŋinde itula noko kilala pwataki tu noko nde Walo Tamwata. Maka kano pano tu pwai sopi ŋinde kulâ ne luma sapâŋa ilo, aku kumo ŋinde ikura zo rârâni.
Aku maka iloma tu noko ne patarawâŋa tamâta ma sipaveta kuku vetâŋa sondo lâ noko ne luma ilo ikura zo zo. Aku maka iloma tu noko ne tamâta ma sisarâwa tava ndekâŋa nâ.
Yova Kindeni, maka kano pano tu kalo ŋgere ŋana ne wurâta tamâta Daviti kâ. Noko ma kupu muli pa tamâta ŋine noko tamwata muŋga kupatea tu ma imo koipu ŋalae, mine ndimo.
Yova Kindeni, noko kuveta ŋgua pâŋa kaika kuku Daviti lâ, aku noko ŋana kulele ne ŋgua ipâŋga kie toŋge kilo, ande tia. Noko ne ŋgua pambwareŋa ikeno mine; “Muli mbo noko ne zo marumbu lâ ŋga, ŋineŋga naŋa ma ao noko natu tamâne toŋge ikai noko nia ŋana imo koipu ŋalae.
Ambo noko ne vâsa kinzi ma siveta ikura naneŋgu ŋgua pâŋa mine, aku ma sipono muli pa ŋgua tukuŋa rârâni naŋa ma alanzi ŋinde tona, ande noko timbu wukale kala ma muli sikai noko nia mine nâ, ku ma simo koipu ŋalaŋala ikura zo rârâni.”
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ipatea Saion lawea lâ. I ilo tu ma imo ne lawea ŋinde ku imo nâ.
Iporo tu, “Naŋa ma amo lawea ŋine ikura zo rârâni. Naŋa iloŋgu pa lawea ŋine, kala ma amo koipu ŋalae lâ lawea ŋainani nâ.
Naŋa ma amo ŋai ku ma arombonzi tamâta ŋinde simo Saion lawea, kala kinzi ma siroto ŋana kelekele toŋge tia. Mao nâ, naŋa ma kâpwa alanzi sugorai tamâta simo ŋine, kala ma kapwanzi pupuro ndo.
Naŋa ma wurâta alanzi Saion ne patarawâŋa tamâta, kala kinzi ma situla pwataki tu naŋa uru akainzi tamâta piti lâ kazâŋa ilo. Mine kala naneŋgu tamâta simo Saion lawea ŋine nde ma siwâŋgi ku ma sisarâwa tava ndekâŋa nâ.
Naŋa ma akai tamâta toŋge lâ Daviti ne vâsa ŋgu, aku ma ao i imo koipu ŋalae lâ lawea ŋine. Naŋa apatea i tu ma ikai koipu ikura zo zo, itogo sinâla mine.
Daviti ne walo kaika ma ivilanzi tamâta rârâni i uru ikai poe panzi ŋinde, kala ma simo ara nâ. Andeta naŋa ma aveta maŋeti ŋalae panzi i ne kazâŋa tamâta.” Yova Kindeni kawa ŋgua kala ŋine.
Ambo Yova Kindeni ne tamâta ma simo ilonzi taitu nâ, ande ŋinde ma ara ku ara ndo.
Mâsi mine nde ara ndo, itogo samimi ara ŋinde kinzi muŋga sipaliŋi lâ patarawâŋa tamâta Aron kulu. Samimi ŋinde irere indue ipâŋga ndaŋgeni pwau, aku indue ilâ ikura ne pasawaŋa luandondo ŋgaŋe. Kinzi tamâta simora ŋinde ku ilonzi ndeka.
Mao nâ, mâsi ŋana tamo taitu tava ilonda taitu nâ, ande ara ndo, itogo mwâka ŋinde uru mbo mbo imbe ndue Hermon Tuu kulu wa Saion lawea ne tuu kulunzi wa. Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni iveta kie ara ndo panzi tamâta simo Saion lawea, kala ma simo ara mine ku simo nâ.
Miki Yova Kindeni ne wurâta tamâta ŋine uru mbo mbo kaveta wurâta lâ i ne luma sapâŋa ilo, miki rârâni kamâ kapanea i kasuka ŋa kâki!
Miki naomi pa Nia Sapâŋa Ndo ŋinde, aku mbaumi kâki kano pa Yova Kindeni wa kasuka i ŋa kâki wa.
Naŋa iloŋgu tu Yova Kindeni, ina imo Saion lawea, ma iveta kie ara ndo pa miki. Inani nia ndoyo ipulia samba wa tâno wa.
Tapanea Yova Kindeni tasuka i ŋa kâki! Miki Yova Kindeni ne wurâta tamâta ŋine uru kamandi i ne luma ilo, kinda nenda Maro Kindeni ne luma sapâŋa ŋinde, ande miki kapanea i ŋa kasuka kâki!
<range>
Tapanea i ŋa tasuka kâki, ŋana tu i nde ara tamwata. Kinda ma tawâŋgi wâŋgiŋa paneâŋa kâ papa i, ŋana tu ŋinde ma iveta ilonda ndeka.
Yova Kindeni ipatea kinda Yakopu ne vâsa ŋgu pa i tamwata. Mine kala kinda Isrel tamâta tamo i tamwata ne ŋgu sondo.
Mao nâ, naŋa asama tu nenda Maro Ŋalae ne walo kaika nde ŋalae ndo, aku ina ipolenzi maro laŋeŋa rârâni.
Vetâŋa ndia Yova Kindeni ilo tu ma iveta lâ samba ilo wa tâno kulu wa tâi ilo wa tâi duvi lâmbu wa, ande i ma iveta vetâŋani ndaina ikura i tamwata nâ ne pateâŋa mine.
Aku ina kala igonanzi karâzi ne take-take ŋalaŋala sipâŋga lâ nia ŋgaŋe, aku ina isupwa loloa iyoka tava karâzi indue imâ. Ina tamwata uru isupwa lawea ipile ne luma ku iyâti ilâ wa imâ wa.
Aku nanayoni, inani kala ipunzi Isip tamâta natunzi tamâne nzâla-kulu rârâni sipamateteu, aku ipunzi nenzi ŋgoa-mbwâmbwa natunzi nzâla-kulu sipamateteu mine nâ.
Aku iveta mâsi kaika kie-kie pinde lâ Isip tâno ŋinde tona, ŋana ipare nia pa nenzi koipu ŋalae tavanzi i ne sukâŋa tamâta.
Aku muli ŋga Yova Kindeni izavarunzi tamâta ŋgu rârâ ŋinde. Kinzi ŋgu ŋinde nenzi koipu ŋalaŋala simo tava walo kaika ndo, andeta ipunzi pâta simâte.
Mao nâ, Yova Kindeni ipu Amor ŋgu nenzi koipu ŋalae Sihon pâta imâte lâ, aku ipu Basan ŋgu nenzi koipu ŋalae Ok pâta imâte tona. Aku ipunzi ŋgu rârâni simo Kenan tâno ŋinde nenzi koipu ŋalaŋala simâte tona.
Ŋineŋga ikai koipu ŋalaŋala ŋinde nenzi tâno ku ikisi keri panzi ne ŋgu Isrel.
Mine nde Yova Kindeni, ikura zo zo kinzi tamâta ma sisama noko kilala pwataki tu noko nde Maro Ŋalae mao. Mao nâ, kinzi tamâta ma situla noko parina pwataki ikura zo muli-muli.
Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni ma iveta vetâŋa sondo nâ panzi ne tamâta lâ ŋgua nia. I ma kalo sukâŋa ŋana ne wurâta tamâta kinda.
Kinda tasama tu kinzi tinikoa ŋgu rârâni nenzi maro nde kelekele kaa nâ. Kinzi tamâta nâ sipare tainzi lâ mira “silva” tini wa mira “gol” tini wa.
Kinzi maro laŋeŋa ŋinde kawanzi keno, andeta sikura tu siporo ŋgua kâ, ande tia. Kinzi matanzi keno, andeta sikura tu simora kelekele kâ, ande tia.
Kinzi taŋanzi keno, andeta sikura tu siloŋo ŋgua, ande tia. Aku kinzi sikura tu simbana korananzi, ande tia ndo.
Ara ŋana kinzi tamâta uru sipare maro laŋeŋa kaa kaa tainzi ŋinde ma sipâŋga simo rege-rege kunzi maro laŋeŋa ŋinde. Naŋa iloŋgu tu tamâta ea uru kalonzi tawana maro laŋeŋa ŋinde, ande kinzi kala ma sipâŋga kaa nâ, sitogonzi kinzi mine.
Aŋga miki Isrel tamâta, miki kapanea Yova Kindeni kasuka i ŋa kâki! Aŋga miki Yova Kindeni ne patarawâŋa tamâta lâ Aron ne vâsa ŋgu, miki kala kapanea i ŋa kasuka kâki!
Aŋga miki tamâta lâ Livai ne vâsa ŋgu, miki kala kapanea Yova Kindeni ŋa kasuka kâki! Miki tamâta ea uru kamege ŋana Yova Kindeni kâ, miki rârâni kapanea i ŋa kasuka kâki!
Mao nâ, miki tamâta kamo Saion Tuu kulu lâ Yova Kindeni ne lawea Jerusalem ilo, miki ŋinde kapanea i ŋa kasuka kâki! Tapanea Yova Kindeni ŋa tasuka kâki!
Kinda kawânda ndaŋge ilâ pa Yova Kindeni, ŋana tu i nde ara tamwata. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Kinda taporo ndaŋge ilâ pa Maro Kindeni, ina ipolenzi maro rârâni. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Kinda taporo ndaŋge ilâ pa Maro Ŋalae, ina kala ipolenzi tamâta ŋalaŋala rârâni simo tâno kulu. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina simbo nâ uru iveta mâsi ŋalaŋala. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
I ne ilo-kalo nde ŋalae ndo; mine kala ipulia samba ipâŋga lâ. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina io tâno imandi lââ kulu. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina ionzi sinâla ŋalaŋala sipâŋga samba tini. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Aku ina io kari tu ikatona mbwale. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina io nzimona tavanzi pitu tu sikatona mbo. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina nanayoni ivilanzi timbunda, kala ipunzi Isip tamâta natunzi tamâne nzâla-kulu pâta sipamateteu. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ŋineŋga ina ikainzi Isrel ŋgu sipile Isip tâno siyâti simâ. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
I tamwata ne walo nde kaika ndo, kala iveta mine. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Aku muli ŋga ina ipu Tâi Ŋiŋi kala ipwa pwataki mo rua. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ŋineŋga ina ikainzi ne tamâta soka mâsa-mâsa nâ lâ tâi ŋgini simbwaliu silâ. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Andeta ipatuku Isip nenzi koipu ŋalae tavanzi ne zugu tamâta sinu lââ kala sipamateteu lâ. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Aku ina imuŋga panzi ne tamâta soka nia bilimu silâ. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ŋineŋga ina ipunzi koipu kaika ŋalaŋala pâta simâte. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Kinzi koipu ŋalaŋala ŋinde nawalanzi pinde nde ŋanzi ŋalae, andeta ipunzi pâta simâte. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina ipu Amor ŋgu nenzi koipu ŋalae Sihon pâta imâte. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Aku ina kala ipu Basan ŋgu nenzi koipu ŋalae Ok pâta imâte tona. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ŋineŋga ikai kinzi koipu ŋalaŋala ŋinde nenzi tâno, aku ikisi keri panzi ne tamâta. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ŋineŋga tâno ŋinde ilanzi ne wurâta tamâta Isrel. ‘Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Kinzi simo lee aku muli, ŋineŋga nenda kazâŋa tamâta sipole kinda lâ, andeta i ŋandai kalo kapa ŋana kinda ŋga. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
I kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana kinda kâ, kala ikai kinda piti lâ nenda kazâŋa tamâta mbaunzi ilo. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Ina uru kâpwa ilanzi kelekele rârâni simo vianzi. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Mine nde kawânda ndaŋge ilâ pa Maro Kindeni, inani imo samba ilo. “Mao nâ, i tini mwasa ndo pa kinda ikura zo rârâni.
Maka kasaŋona Babilon ŋgu nenzi lââ ŋgaŋe-ŋgaŋe, aku kaloma ŋgere ŋana nema lawea Saion kâ. Mine nde maka kaloma sukâŋa kala kamo kapataiŋa nâ.
Maka kasonanzi nema wâŋgu sitâra lâ kâi simandi waŋgirama ŋinde lakanzi kulu, aku kapile keno.
Maka kaveta mine ŋana duvi ŋine kâ: kinzi kazâŋa tamâta muŋga sikai maka kaika sioma lâ nenzi tâno ŋinde, aku kinzi ŋinde sipai maka tu, “Kala ŋine miki ma kawâŋgi wâŋgiŋa toŋge ŋana iveta maka iloma ara kâ. Kawâŋgi Saion ne wâŋgiŋa toŋge!”
Opopo, maka kamo kinzi tinikoa nenzi lawea ma! Mine nde maka kakura ŋana kandeka ku kawâŋgi Yova Kindeni ne wâŋgiŋa mâsi mana, a? Tia ndo!
O Jerusalem lawea, ambo naŋa ma kaloŋgu kapa ŋanano, ande ara ŋana Yova Kindeni ma iyaula mbauŋgu, ŋana naŋa ma akura tu ara neŋgu wâŋgu kilo tia.
O Jerusalem lawea, ambo naŋa ma kaloŋgu kapa ŋanano, ambo naŋa ma apile naneŋgu mâsi ŋana andekanano ŋalae tina kâ, ande ara ŋana Yova Kindeni ma iveta ŋandolâŋgu sakamao, ŋana naŋa ma akura tu awâŋgi wâŋgiŋa kilo tia.
O Yova Kindeni, maka kano pano tu kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana vetâŋa sakamao ŋinde kinzi Idom ŋgu siveta, lâ zo ŋinde nema kazâŋa tamâta sipara kuma ku sipole Jerusalem lawea. Kalo ŋgere kilo ŋana ŋgua ŋinde kinzi simo siporo mine tu, “Kazavaru Jerusalem lawea ndoni! Kazavaru ne luma wa kelekele rârâni marumbuni lâ!”
Aŋga miki Babilon ŋgu, kaloŋo ŋga; Yova Kindeni ne pateâŋa ikeno tu i ma izavaru miki ndo lâ. Tamâta ea ipare nia pami ŋana vetâŋa sakamao miki muŋga kaveta pa maka ŋinde, ande i ma iveta mâsi ara ndo.
I ma indeka ŋana ikainzi nemi lâlu puro-puro ku itambiranzi sindue mira kulu sipamateteu.
Yova Kindeni, naŋa iloŋgu kaloŋgu ndoni aporo ndaŋge imâ pa noko. Naŋa amandi kinzi maro rârâni naonzi ku awâŋgi wâŋgiŋa paneâŋa kâ pa noko.
Noko tini mwasa pa naŋa ikura zo rârâni, aku noko uru kuveta ikura ne ŋgua rârâni. Aku noko kusuka tamwata ŋa tava ne ŋgua pâŋa ŋinde kâki ndo, kala ipole kelekele pinde rârâni. Mine nde naŋa naoŋgu pa noko ne luma sapâŋa, ku apare tukuŋgu apaneano asuka noko ŋa kâki.
Naŋa asarâwa pa noko lâ, aku noko kupaloŋo pa naneŋgu noŋa kala kuo tamwata ne walo ŋalae imâ pana ku ipu tini kaika pa iloŋgu kaloŋgu.
Aku koipu ŋalaŋala rârâni simo tâno ndoni kala siloŋo pâri ŋana noko ne ŋgua tukuŋa kâ. Mine kala kinzi ma sipanea noko ŋa sisuka kâki.
Kinzi ma siwâŋgi wâŋgiŋa situla noko ne vetâŋa ŋalaŋala pwataki, aku ma situla noko kilala pwataki tona tu noko ŋa imo ŋalae ndo.
O Yova Kindeni, noko kumo âta ndo, andeta noko kalo ŋgere ŋananzi tamâta ŋine uru sipatawa warakanzi tininzi. Aŋga tamâta ea uru sipasuka warakanzi tininzi, ande kinzi ŋinde sikura tu sipavea ŋanano, ande tia.
Mao nâ, lâ zo ŋana malia kie-kie ipâŋga pa naŋa, ande noko uru pwea ŋanana kala amo ara nâ. Naneŋgu kazâŋa tamâta wisinzi nâna ŋalae pa naŋa, andeta noko uru kumandi kupara kunzi. Noko ne walo nde kaika ndo; mine nde noko pwai naŋa piti lâ kazâŋa ilo.
Yova Kindeni ma iveta vetâŋa rârâni ŋinde i muŋga ipa ŋgua tu ma iveta pa naŋa. Ŋana tu Yova Kindeni, noko ne tini-mwasa uru ikeno mine ku imo nâ. Mine nde noko ma kupile noko mwasi maka Isrel ŋgu ndimo.
Yova Kindeni, noko mata kulea sondo pa iloŋgu kaloŋgu, kala kusama naŋa kilalâŋgu marumbu lâ.
Ambo naŋa asaŋona tâku amandi tâku, ande noko kumora ku kusama naneŋgu vetâŋa rârâni. Noko kumo malawae ŋinde, andeta kusama naneŋgu ilo-kalo rârâni.
Ambo naŋa aveta wurâta tâku apwarea tâku, ande noko kumora ku kusama. Naneŋgu vetâŋa rârâni nde ikeno nia yo lâ noko nao.
Yova Kindeni, ambo naŋa iloŋgu tu aporo ŋgua, andeta aporo pwataki tia yo yo, ande nanayoni noko kusama naneŋgu ŋgua ŋinde marumbu lâ.
Mao nâ, noko kuŋge naŋa mbwaliu lâ kutogo ŋgumbi mwasina, aku noko tamwata uru pwea ŋanana.
Naŋa iloŋgu ikai wurâta ŋalae ŋana asama noko ne vetâŋa ŋinde duvi kâ. Opopo, noko ne ilo-kalo nde kelekele ŋalae tina, kala akura tu asama duvi tia ndo!
Mine kala ambo naŋa atu apavea ŋanano, ande naŋa ma alâ pa sinia, a? Naŋa ma akâwa alâ pa nia ndia ŋana noko ma kumorana tia, a? Tia ndo!
Ambo naŋa ma akâki pa samba lawea âta ŋinde, ande noko kumo niani ndaina. Ambo naŋa ma alâ pa mateŋa nianzi, ande noko kala kumo nia ŋinde tona.
Ambo naŋa ma alou alâ lee apâŋga nia malawae ndo pa mbwera kâ, tâku alâ amo nia malawae ndo pa wâra kâ tâku,
ande noko ma kumo niani ndaina tona, aku noko ma pwai poe sondo pa naŋa wa kusaŋa mbauŋgu kuvilana wa.
Mao nâ, ambo naŋa ma ano pa kondoma tu imâ ivea naŋa, ambo naŋa ma ano pa kari tu ipalele ipâŋga ŋaŋa, ande naŋa ma akura tu apavea ŋana noko kâ, ande tia.
Ŋana tu kondoma ikura tu ipono noko mata, ande tia ndo. Kondoma wa mbwale pwataki wa nde kelekele kie taituni lâ noko nao. Mine nde noko uru kumora nia lâ kari wa mbo wa.
Yova Kindeni, nanayoni noko tamwata kuveta karaeŋgu ne pinde-pinde ndoni. Noko kuo naŋa apâŋga nana kapwa ilo, aku kuseŋge tukâŋgu ndoni ilâ taitu.
